column1: Toplamda 746 Gladyatör uçağı üretilmişti ve savaşın başlangıç safhalarında özellikle Norveç Seferi ve Malta savunmasında temayüz göstererek hizmet verdiler. RAF’ın en skorer pilotu 15½ onaylı can alan Filo Lideri ‘Pat’ Pattle ve Akdeniz’de HMS Eagle’da harekât yapmak üzere savaş taktikleri üzerine emrindeki Swordfish pilotlarının bir kısmını eğiten Kraliyet Donanma Komutanı Charles Keighly Peach Gladyatörlerde başarı gösteren pilotlara dâhildir.

;格\t罗\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t1937 \t年\t起\t服\t役\t于\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t作\t为\t末\t代\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t尽\t管\t它\t经\t常\t处\t于\t更\t现\t代\t的\t单\t翼\t机\t的\t阴\t影\t之\t下\t，\t它\t是\t否\t堪\t称\t最\t优\t秀\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t争\t论\t依\t然\t经\t久\t不\t息\t。\t
\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t在\t投\t产\t时\t就\t已\t经\t公\t认\t过\t时\t了\t，\t但\t虑\t及\t战\t争\t全\t面\t爆\t发\t的\t时\t候\t英\t国\t恐\t怕\t来\t不\t及\t开\t发\t数\t量\t充\t足\t的\t单\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t的\t生\t产\t才\t没\t有\t中\t止\t。\t

\t“\t手\t套\t”\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t研\t制\t取\t得\t成\t功\t后\t，\t趁\t热\t打\t铁\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t也\t进\t入\t研\t发\t序\t列\t，\t以\t取\t代\t老\t旧\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t牛\t犬\t”\t。\t结\t果\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t采\t用\t了\t封\t闭\t座\t舱\t、\t新\t式\t机\t翼\t和\t更\t近\t流\t线\t型\t的\t固\t定\t起\t落\t架\t等\t设\t计\t，\t其\t武\t装\t也\t增\t加\t到\t 4 \t挺.303 \t机\t枪\t。\t之\t后\t，\t最\t初\t一\t批\t交\t付\t给\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t的\t“\t斗\t士\t”\tMk I \t型\t有\t 231 \t架\t。\t

Mk II \t型\t采\t用\t了\t可\t靠\t性\t更\t高\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t托\t“\t水\t星\t”\tVIIIA/AS \t发\t动\t机\t，\t功\t率\t为\t 830 \t马\t力\t。\t还\t安\t装\t了\t电\t打\t火\t器\t、\t自\t动\t混\t合\t燃\t料\t控\t制\t器\t、\t沃\t克\t斯\t空\t气\t过\t滤\t器\t和\t一\t个\t用\t以\t取\t代\t早\t期\t木\t制\t双\t叶\t桨\t的\t金\t属\t三\t叶\t桨\t。\t有\t 38 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t先\t驱\t被\t装\t上\t着\t舰\t钩\t化\t身\t“\t海\t斗\t士\t”\t，\t开\t始\t了\t在\t海\t军\t航\t空\t队\t的\t服\t役\t生\t涯\t。\t此\t后\t又\t有\t 60 \t架\t正\t式\t的\t海\t航\t版\t斗\t士\t完\t成\t交\t付\t，\t它\t们\t除\t带\t有\t舰\t钩\t外\t，\t还\t加\t装\t了\t弹\t射\t装\t置\t和\t橡\t皮\t艇\t收\t容\t器\t。\t

746 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t成\t机\t服\t役\t期\t间\t表\t现\t优\t异\t，\t它\t们\t在\t战\t争\t初\t期\t，\t特\t别\t是\t挪\t威\t战\t役\t和\t马\t耳\t他\t防\t御\t战\t中\t颇\t有\t建\t树\t。\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t取\t得\t成\t功\t的\t飞\t行\t员\t包\t括\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t首\t席\t王\t牌\t“\t帕\t特\t”\t帕\t特\t尔\t空\t军\t少\t校\t，\t他\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t的\t战\t绩\t是\t确\t认\t击\t落\t 15 \t架\t；\t还\t有\t皇\t家\t海\t军\t查\t尔\t斯\t·\t肯\t利\t-\t皮\t奇\t海\t军\t中\t校\t，\t他\t曾\t在\t“\t鹰\t”\t号\t航\t母\t于\t地\t中\t海\t执\t行\t任\t务\t期\t间\t，\t训\t练\t其\t“\t箭\t鱼\t”\t僚\t机\t们\t在\t任\t务\t中\t应\t用\t空\t战\t战\t术\t。";"グロスター グラディエーターは、\t1937年に\tイギリス\t空軍の\t最後の\t複葉戦闘機として\t使用された、\t単発単座戦闘機で、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機よりしばしば\t見劣りしていると\t考えれられていましたが、\t史上最高の\t複葉戦闘機であることはほぼ\t間違いありません。\t
グラディエーターの\t製造時には、\t既に\t複葉機の\t設計は\t時代遅れであると\t考えられていましたが、\t大戦が\t始まる\t前に、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機を\t十分な\t数開発できる\t時間が\tイギリスには\t残されていないという\t懸念があったのです。\t

初期の\tゴーントレット\t戦闘機の\t成功を\t基に、\t老朽化した\tブリストル ブルドッグと\t入れ\t替えるために\tグラディエーターは\t開発されました。\t密閉型操縦室、\t新しい\t翼、\tより\t流線形となった\t改良された\t着陸装置が\t特徴で、\t武装は\t4挺の\t0.303\tインチ\t機関銃へと\t拡大されました。\t最初に\t231機の\tグラディエーター\tMk Isが\tイギリス\t空軍へと\t送られました。\t

グラディエーター\tMk II\t型には、\tMk I\t型の\tマーキュリー IX\tエンジンの\t代わりに、\tより\t信頼性の\t高い\t830馬力出力可能な\tブリストル・マーキュリー\tVIIIA / AS\tエンジンが\t搭載されました。\tまた、\t電気始動装置、\t自動混合制御装置、\tヴォークス\t社製\tエアフィルター、\t初期の\t木製\t2枚刃と\t入れ\t替えるために、\t金属製\t3枚刃も\t搭載されています。\t38機の\tグラディエーター\tMk II\t型は\tシーグラディエーターという\t名称で\t艦隊航空隊での\t任務に\t就くべく\tアレスター・フックが\t備え\t付けられ、\tカタパルトポイントと\tゴムボートを\t搭載し、\t完全に\t艦上機の\t改造が\t施された\t60機も\t輸送されました。\t

合計で\t746機の\tグラディエーター\t航空機が\t製造され、\t戦争開始時から、\t主に\tノルウェーの\t戦いや\tマルタ\t包囲戦で\t使用されました。\tグラディエーターを\t操縦して\t成功を\t掴んだ\tパイロットには、\tグラディエーターで\t確定撃墜数\t15 ½を\tマークした、\tイギリス\t空軍の\tトップ・エースであり\t分隊\tリーダーでもある“パット”・パトルや、\t地中海で\tHMS\tイーグルから\t戦闘機を\t操縦するために、\t複数の\tソードフィッシュの\tパイロットを\t訓練した、\tイギリス\t海軍指揮官である\tチャールズ・ケイリー・ピーチがいます。";"O Gloster Gladiator era um caça monomotor
column2: de um único tripulante
column3: que entrou em serviço em 1937 como o último caça biplano da Força Aérea Real. Muitas vezes ofuscado por monoplanos mais modernos
column4: ainda permaneceu indiscutivelmente o maior caça biplano de todos os tempos.

column1: O  projeto dos biplanos já era considerado ultrapassado quando começou a produção do Gladiator
column2: mas temia-se que a Grã-Bretanha nao teria tempo para desenvolver monoplanos mais modernos em quantidades suficientes
column3: antes da guerra em grande escala começar.

column1: Aproveitando o sucesso do caça anterior Gauntlet
column2: o Gladiator foi desenvolvido para substituir o velho Bristol Bulldog. Apresentando um cockpit fechado
column3: novas asas e um trem de aterragem fixo mais aerodinâmico
column4: o armamento também foi aumentado para quatro metralhadoras de 0
column5: 303 polegadas. Inicialmente
column6: 231 Gladiator Mk Is foram entregues para a RAF.

column1: O modelo Mk II tinha o mais confiável Bristol Mercury VIII / como motor com uma potência de 830 cavalos no lugar do Mk I Mercury IX; Este também foi equipado com um motor de partida elétrico
column2: controle automático de mistura
column3: filtro de ar Vokes e uma hélice com três pás de metal para substituir a variante inicial de duas pás de madeira. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs também foram equipados com prendedores de ganchos para servir o Fleet Air Arm como Sea Gladiators até 60 variantes totalmente navais também foram entregues
column4: os últimos sendo equipados com pontos de catapulta e acondicionamento de um bote.

column1: Um total de 746 aeronaves Gladiators foram produzidas e serviram com distinção na fase de abertura da guerra
column2: notavelmente durante a campanha norueguesa e na defesa de Malta. Pilotos que alcançaram sucesso no Gladiator incluiu-se o melhor marcador e Líder de Esquadrão
column3: Pattle 'Pat'
column4: que marcou 15 ½ mortes confirmadas em Gladiators e o Comandante Real Naval Charles Keighly-Peach
column5: quem treinou vários pilotos em seus Swordfish em táticas de caça para operar a partir do HMS Eagle no Mediterrâneo.";"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column6: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column7: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: Був випущений як модифікація Gauntlet для заміни застарілих винищувачів-біпланів Бульдог. Були перероблені крило і стійки шасі; кабіну пілота зробили закритою

Всього було випущено 717 літаків Gladiator

column7: 1937년에 영국 왕립 공군에 취역한 마지막 복엽 전투기입니다. 보다 현대적인 단엽기들의 그늘에 가리워 자주 간과되고는 있지만
column8: 여전히 이 기체는 사상 최고의 복엽기라고 부를만합니다.

column1: 글래디에이터가 생산되기 시작한 때는 이미 복엽기가 구시대적 디자인으로 취급되는 시대였지만

column1: 이전의 건틀릿(Gauntlet) 전투기의 성공을 발판삼아

column1: Mk II 모델은 Mk I 모델에 사용되던 브리스톨 머큐리(Mercury) IX 엔진 대신에 830마력의 머큐리 VIIIA / AS 엔진을 탑재했습니다. 또한 여기에는 전기 스타트 모터

column3: Vokes 사의 공기여과기를 장착했으며
column4: 구식의 목제 2날 프로펠러 대신 철제 3날 프로펠러를 달았습니다. 38대의 글래디에이터 Mk II들은 착함 고리를 부착해 해군에서 시 글래디에이터(Sea Gladiator)라는 이름으로 임시로 운용했으며
column5: 후에 60대의 완전한 해군용 개량형이 전달될 때까지 사용되었습니다. 해군용 개량형은 캐터펄트에 맞으면서 격납고 적재에 용이한 구조로 제작되었습니다.

column1: Au fost produse în total 746 de avioane Gladiator care au servit merituos în faza de început a războiului

column5: care a instruit câțiva dintre piloții săi ""Pește spadă"" în tactici de luptă pentru a opera de pe HMS Eagle din Marea Mediterană.";"格羅斯特「鬥士」是一種單發單座戰鬥機，1937年起服役於皇家空軍。作為末代雙翼戰鬥機，儘管它經常處

column1: 於更現代的單翼機的陰影之下，它是否堪稱最優秀雙翼戰鬥機的爭論依然經久不息。
「鬥士」在投產時就已經公認過時了，但慮及戰爭全面爆發的時候英國恐怕來不及開發數量充足的單翼戰鬥
機，「鬥士」的生產才沒有中止。
「手套」戰鬥機的研製取得成功後，「鬥士」也進入研發序列，以取代老舊的布裡斯特「鬥牛犬」。
結果，「鬥士」採用了封閉座艙、新式機翼和更近流線型的固定起落架等設計，其武裝也增加到4挺.303機
槍。之後，最初一批交付給皇家空軍的「鬥士」Mk I型有231架。
MkII型採用了可靠性更高的布里斯托「水星」VIIIA/AS發動機，功率為830馬力。還安裝了電打火器、自動混合
燃料控制器、沃克斯空氣過濾器和一個用以取代早期木製雙葉槳的金屬三葉槳。有38架「鬥士」先驅被裝上
著艦鉤化身「海鬥士」，開始了在海軍航空隊的服役生涯。此後又有60架正式的海航版鬥士完成交付，它們
除帶有艦鉤外，還加裝了彈射裝置和橡皮艇收容器。
746架「鬥士」成機服役期間表現優異，它們在戰爭初期，特別是挪威戰役和馬耳他防禦戰中頗有建樹。
在「鬥士」上取得成功的飛行員包括皇家空軍首席王牌「帕特」帕特爾空軍少校，他在「鬥士」上的戰績是
確認擊落15架；還有皇家海軍查爾斯·肯利-皮奇海軍中校，他曾在「鷹」號航母於地中海執行任務期間，訓
練其「箭魚」僚機們在任務中套用空戰戰術。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

encyclopedia/gladiator_mk2_silver/desc;"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column2: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column3: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: ;Le Gloster Gladiator est un chasseur monoplace qui est entré en service en 1937 dans la Royal Air Force comme le dernier avion de chasse biplan monomoteur. Souvent éclipsé par des monoplans plus modernes
column2: il reste sans doute le plus grand avion de chasse biplan de tous les temps.  La conception de ce biplan était déjà considérée comme obsolète au moment où a commencé sa production
column3: mais la Grande-Bretagne craignait de ne pas avoir le temps de développer des monoplans plus modernes en quantité suffisante avant le début de la guerre à grande échelle.  S'appuyant sur le succès antérieur du chasseur Gauntlet
column4: le Gladiator a été développé pour remplacer le vieillissant Bristol Bulldog. Doté d'un cockpit fermé
column5: de nouvelles ailes et d'un train d'atterrissage fixe rationalisé
column6: l'armement a été également porté à quatre mitrailleuses de 0
column7: 303 pouce. Au départ
column8: 231 Gladiator Mk Is ont été livrés à la RAF.  Le modèle Mk II avait le moteur plus fiable Mercure Bristol VIIIA de 830 chevaux en lieu et place du Mercury IX. Egalement équipé un démarreur électrique
column9: d'un contrôle de mélange automatique
column10: de filtres à air Vokes et d'une hélice tripale en métal en remplacement de l'ancienne bipale en bois. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs ont été également équipés de crochets d'appontage pour servir dans la Fleet Air Arm comme Sea Gladiators et jusqu'à 60 versions entièrement navalisées ont été également livrées
column11: montées avec des points d'accroche de catapulte et avec un arrimage de canot.  Un total de 746 Gladiator ont été produits et servirent avec distinction dans les premières phases de la guerre
column12: notamment lors de la campagne de Norvège et dans la défense de Malte. Parmis les meilleurs pilotes de Gladiator on retrouve l'As de la RAF
column13: Pattle « Pat » chef d'Escadron
column14: qui a marqué 15 ½ avions abattus confirmés et le Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column15: qui a formé plusieurs pilotes de Swordfish aux tactiques de chasse pour opérer depuis le HMS Eagle en Méditerranée.  ";"Il Gloster Gladiator è entrato in servizio nel 1937 come ultimo caccia biplano della Royal Air Force. Spesso oscurato dai più moderni monoplani
column16: rimase senza dubbio il miglior biplano di tutti i tempi.

column1: Il design era già considerato fin da quando fu sviluppato il Gladiator ma vi era la paura tra i Britannici che non vi fosse abbastanza tempo per sviluppare un più moderno monoplano in quantità sufficente prima dell'inizio della guerra.
Il Gladiator venne rilasciato come una modifica del Gauntlet
column2: rimpiazzando gli obsoleti caccia Bulldog. Le ali ed il carrello d'atterraggio vennero riprogettate
column3: la cabina di pilotaggio coperta
column4: aggiunti nuovi carrelli da una linea più aerodinamica e l'armamento aumentato a 4 mitragliatrici da 0.303 pollici.

column1: Inizialmente vennero messi in servizio 231 Gladiator Mk.I nella RAF.
Il modello Mk.II aveva un più affidabile motore Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS con una potenza di 830hp al posto del Mercury IX; a questo si aggiunse un motorino d'avviamento elettrico
column2: controllo della miscela automatico
column3: filtri dell'aria Vokes ed un'elica triplala in metallo come rimpiazzo delle bipala di legno. 38 Gladiator Mk.II vennero equipaggiati anche di gancio di arresto per le unità destinate alla Marina sotto la denominazione di Sea Gladiator
column4: successivamente il numerò venne incrementato a 60 come unità totalmente navalizzate predisposti per le catapulte.

column1: Vennero prodotti un totale di 746 Gladiator che servirono la Gran Bretagna fin dalle prime fasi della Guerra in particolare nella campagna Norvegese e nella difesa di Malta.

column1: Der Gloster Gladiator Doppeldecker war der letzte und der beste Doppeldecker der British Air Force.

column1: ;格\t罗\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t1937 \t年\t起\t服\t役\t于\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t作\t为\t末\t代\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t尽\t管\t它\t经\t常\t处\t于\t更\t现\t代\t的\t单\t翼\t机\t的\t阴\t影\t之\t下\t，\t它\t是\t否\t堪\t称\t最\t优\t秀\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t争\t论\t依\t然\t经\t久\t不\t息\t。\t
\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t在\t投\t产\t时\t就\t已\t经\t公\t认\t过\t时\t了\t，\t但\t虑\t及\t战\t争\t全\t面\t爆\t发\t的\t时\t候\t英\t国\t恐\t怕\t来\t不\t及\t开\t发\t数\t量\t充\t足\t的\t单\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t的\t生\t产\t才\t没\t有\t中\t止\t。\t

\t“\t手\t套\t”\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t研\t制\t取\t得\t成\t功\t后\t，\t趁\t热\t打\t铁\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t也\t进\t入\t研\t发\t序\t列\t，\t以\t取\t代\t老\t旧\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t牛\t犬\t”\t。\t结\t果\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t采\t用\t了\t封\t闭\t座\t舱\t、\t新\t式\t机\t翼\t和\t更\t近\t流\t线\t型\t的\t固\t定\t起\t落\t架\t等\t设\t计\t，\t其\t武\t装\t也\t增\t加\t到\t 4 \t挺.303 \t机\t枪\t。\t之\t后\t，\t最\t初\t一\t批\t交\t付\t给\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t的\t“\t斗\t士\t”\tMk I \t型\t有\t 231 \t架\t。\t

Mk II \t型\t采\t用\t了\t可\t靠\t性\t更\t高\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t托\t“\t水\t星\t”\tVIIIA/AS \t发\t动\t机\t，\t功\t率\t为\t 830 \t马\t力\t。\t还\t安\t装\t了\t电\t打\t火\t器\t、\t自\t动\t混\t合\t燃\t料\t控\t制\t器\t、\t沃\t克\t斯\t空\t气\t过\t滤\t器\t和\t一\t个\t用\t以\t取\t代\t早\t期\t木\t制\t双\t叶\t桨\t的\t金\t属\t三\t叶\t桨\t。\t有\t 38 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t先\t驱\t被\t装\t上\t着\t舰\t钩\t化\t身\t“\t海\t斗\t士\t”\t，\t开\t始\t了\t在\t海\t军\t航\t空\t队\t的\t服\t役\t生\t涯\t。\t此\t后\t又\t有\t 60 \t架\t正\t式\t的\t海\t航\t版\t斗\t士\t完\t成\t交\t付\t，\t它\t们\t除\t带\t有\t舰\t钩\t外\t，\t还\t加\t装\t了\t弹\t射\t装\t置\t和\t橡\t皮\t艇\t收\t容\t器\t。\t

746 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t成\t机\t服\t役\t期\t间\t表\t现\t优\t异\t，\t它\t们\t在\t战\t争\t初\t期\t，\t特\t别\t是\t挪\t威\t战\t役\t和\t马\t耳\t他\t防\t御\t战\t中\t颇\t有\t建\t树\t。\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t取\t得\t成\t功\t的\t飞\t行\t员\t包\t括\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t首\t席\t王\t牌\t“\t帕\t特\t”\t帕\t特\t尔\t空\t军\t少\t校\t，\t他\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t的\t战\t绩\t是\t确\t认\t击\t落\t 15 \t架\t；\t还\t有\t皇\t家\t海\t军\t查\t尔\t斯\t·\t肯\t利\t-\t皮\t奇\t海\t军\t中\t校\t，\t他\t曾\t在\t“\t鹰\t”\t号\t航\t母\t于\t地\t中\t海\t执\t行\t任\t务\t期\t间\t，\t训\t练\t其\t“\t箭\t鱼\t”\t僚\t机\t们\t在\t任\t务\t中\t应\t用\t空\t战\t战\t术\t。";"グロスター グラディエーターは、\t1937年に\tイギリス\t空軍の\t最後の\t複葉戦闘機として\t使用された、\t単発単座戦闘機で、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機よりしばしば\t見劣りしていると\t考えれられていましたが、\t史上最高の\t複葉戦闘機であることはほぼ\t間違いありません。\t
グラディエーターの\t製造時には、\t既に\t複葉機の\t設計は\t時代遅れであると\t考えられていましたが、\t大戦が\t始まる\t前に、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機を\t十分な\t数開発できる\t時間が\tイギリスには\t残されていないという\t懸念があったのです。\t

初期の\tゴーントレット\t戦闘機の\t成功を\t基に、\t老朽化した\tブリストル ブルドッグと\t入れ\t替えるために\tグラディエーターは\t開発されました。\t密閉型操縦室、\t新しい\t翼、\tより\t流線形となった\t改良された\t着陸装置が\t特徴で、\t武装は\t4挺の\t0.303\tインチ\t機関銃へと\t拡大されました。\t最初に\t231機の\tグラディエーター\tMk Isが\tイギリス\t空軍へと\t送られました。\t

グラディエーター\tMk II\t型には、\tMk I\t型の\tマーキュリー IX\tエンジンの\t代わりに、\tより\t信頼性の\t高い\t830馬力出力可能な\tブリストル・マーキュリー\tVIIIA / AS\tエンジンが\t搭載されました。\tまた、\t電気始動装置、\t自動混合制御装置、\tヴォークス\t社製\tエアフィルター、\t初期の\t木製\t2枚刃と\t入れ\t替えるために、\t金属製\t3枚刃も\t搭載されています。\t38機の\tグラディエーター\tMk II\t型は\tシーグラディエーターという\t名称で\t艦隊航空隊での\t任務に\t就くべく\tアレスター・フックが\t備え\t付けられ、\tカタパルトポイントと\tゴムボートを\t搭載し、\t完全に\t艦上機の\t改造が\t施された\t60機も\t輸送されました。\t

合計で\t746機の\tグラディエーター\t航空機が\t製造され、\t戦争開始時から、\t主に\tノルウェーの\t戦いや\tマルタ\t包囲戦で\t使用されました。\tグラディエーターを\t操縦して\t成功を\t掴んだ\tパイロットには、\tグラディエーターで\t確定撃墜数\t15 ½を\tマークした、\tイギリス\t空軍の\tトップ・エースであり\t分隊\tリーダーでもある“パット”・パトルや、\t地中海で\tHMS\tイーグルから\t戦闘機を\t操縦するために、\t複数の\tソードフィッシュの\tパイロットを\t訓練した、\tイギリス\t海軍指揮官である\tチャールズ・ケイリー・ピーチがいます。";"O Gloster Gladiator era um caça monomotor
column2: de um único tripulante
column3: que entrou em serviço em 1937 como o último caça biplano da Força Aérea Real. Muitas vezes ofuscado por monoplanos mais modernos
column4: ainda permaneceu indiscutivelmente o maior caça biplano de todos os tempos.

column1: O projeto dos biplanos já era considerado ultrapassado quando começou a produção do Gladiator
column2: mas temia-se que a Grã-Bretanha nao teria tempo para desenvolver monoplanos mais modernos em quantidades suficientes
column3: antes da guerra em grande escala começar.

column1: Aproveitando o sucesso do caça anterior Gauntlet
column2: o Gladiator foi desenvolvido para substituir o velho Bristol Bulldog. Apresentando um cockpit fechado
column3: novas asas e um trem de aterragem fixo mais aerodinâmico
column4: o armamento também foi aumentado para quatro metralhadoras de 0
column5: 303 polegadas. Inicialmente
column6: 231 Gladiator Mk Is foram entregues para a RAF.

column1: O modelo Mk II tinha o mais confiável Bristol Mercury VIII / como motor com uma potência de 830 cavalos no lugar do Mk I Mercury IX; Este também foi equipado com um motor de partida elétrico
column2: controle automático de mistura
column3: filtro de ar Vokes e uma hélice com três pás de metal para substituir a variante inicial de duas pás de madeira. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs também foram equipados com prendedores de ganchos para servir o Fleet Air Arm como Sea Gladiators até 60 variantes totalmente navais também foram entregues
column4: os últimos sendo equipados com pontos de catapulta e acondicionamento de um bote.

column1: Um total de 746 aeronaves Gladiators foram produzidas e serviram com distinção na fase de abertura da guerra
column2: notavelmente durante a campanha norueguesa e na defesa de Malta. Pilotos que alcançaram sucesso no Gladiator incluiu-se o melhor marcador e Líder de Esquadrão
column3: Pattle 'Pat'
column4: que marcou 15 ½ mortes confirmadas em Gladiators e o Comandante Real Naval Charles Keighly-Peach
column5: quem treinou vários pilotos em seus Swordfish em táticas de caça para operar a partir do HMS Eagle no Mediterrâneo.  ";"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column6: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column7: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: ;Винищувач-біплан Глостер Гладіатор (Gloster Gladiator) був кращим і останнім біпланом
column2: що стояли на озброєнні британських ВПС.

column1: І хоча на момент початку виробництва ""Гладіатора"" конструкція біпланів вже була визнана застарілою
column2: було ясно
column3: що Великобританія може не встигнути розгорнути масове виробництво монопланів до початку великомасштабної війни.

column1: Був випущений як модифікація Gauntlet для заміни застарілих винищувачів-біпланів Бульдог. Були перероблені крило і стійки шасі; кабіну пілота зробили закритою
column2: а також додали посадочні щитки. На вимогу ВПС озброєння збільшили до чотирьох 7
column3: 7-мм кулеметів.

column1: Модифікація Mk.II відрізнялася від першої серійної моделі більш надійним двигуном Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS потужністю 830 к.с. замість Bristol Mercury IX такої ж потужності.
Всього було випущено 717 літаків Gladiator
column2: 311 з яких були модифікації Mk.II. ";"Gloster Gladiator je bio jednomotorni lovac jednosed koji je ušao u službu 1937. godine kao poslednji dvokrilac Kraljevskog ratnog vazduhoplovsvta. Iako često u senci modernih jednokrilaca
column3: ipak je ostao upamćen kao verovatno najbolji lovac dvokrilac svih vremena.

column1: Dizajn dvokrilaca se uveliko smatrao zastarelim u trenutku kad se pristupilo proizvodnji Glostera
column2: ali postojao je strah da nema dovoljno vremena da se razviju moderniji jednokrilci u dovoljnim količinama pre nego što se rat zahukta.

column1: Nastavljajući uspeh prethodnog lovca
column2: Gauntleta
column3: Gladiator je razvijan kako bi zamenio vremešnog Bristol Bulldoga. Imao je zatvorenu pilotsku kabinu
column4: nova krila
column5: i aerodinamičniji fiksni stajni trap dok je naoružanje takođe povećano na četiri mitraljeza kalibra 0.303. Najpre  je 231 komad Gladiatora Mk I isporučeno RAF-u.

column1: Model Mk II je posedovao pouzdaniji Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS motor od 830 konjske snage dok je na modelu Mk I bio motor Mercury IX: Takođe je bio opremljen električnim starter motorom
column2: automatskom kontrolom mešavine
column3: Vokes filterom za vazduh i metalna trokraka elisa je zamenila raniju drvenu dvokraku. 38 komada Gladiatora Mk II je bilo opremljeno kukom za službu u vazdušnim snagama Mornarice pod imenom Sea Gladiator dok nije isporučeno 60 komada potpuno namenjenih mornarici koji su bili opremljeni vezovima za brodski katapult i gumenim čamcima za spasavanje.

column1: Ukupno je proizvedeno 746 Gladiatora koji su imali zapaženu ulogu u početnim fazama rata
column2: posebno tokom norveške kampanje i u odbrani Malte.  Među pilotima koji su bili uspešni sa Gladiatorima su najveći as RAF-a

column4: koji su leteli na avionima tipa  Swordfish
column5: lovačkim tatktikama za dejstva sa broda HMS Eagle u mediteranu.

column1: ;A Gloster Gladiator egy együléses egymotoros vadászgép volt
column2: mely 1937-ben állt szolgálatba a RAF utolsó kétfedeles típusaként. Gyakran csak a modern egyfedelű típusokat emelik ki
column3: de a Gladiator vitathatatlanul minden idők legnagyszerűbb kétfedelűje volt.

column1: A kétfedelű gépek már a Gladiator sorozatgyártásának kezdetén is elavultnak számítottak
column2: de akkor úgy látszott
column3: hogy Nagy Britanniának nem lesz ideje egy modern típust kifejleszteni és sorozatgyártásba vinni a totális háború beállta előtt.

column1: A korábbi Gauntlet sikerére építve
column2: a Gladiator-t a kiöregedő Bristol Bulldog leváltására tervezték. Zárt pilótafülke
column3: új szárnyak és jobban áramvonalazott merev futószárak jellemezték. A fegyverzetet is megnövelték négy 0.303 inch űrméretű géppuskára. Kezdetben 231 Gladiator Mk I-t szállítottak le a RAF-nak.

column1: A Mk II-t  a Mk I Mercury IX helyett a sokkal megbízhatóbb Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS motorral szerelték fel
column2: melynek 830 lóerős teljesítménye volt. Elektromos indítóberendezéssel
column3: automata keverékszabályzóval
column4: Vokes légszűrővel és a korábbi kétágú falégcsavar helyett háromágú fém légcsavarral látták el. 38 fékezőhoroggal felszerelt Mk II-t kapott a flotta
column5: amíg megérkezett a 60 navalizált példány is
column6: melyeket később katapult csatlakozópontokkal és mentőcsónakkal szereltek fel.

column1: Összesen 746 Gladiator készült és szolgált a háború elején
column2: melyek részt vettek többek között Norvégia és Málta védelmében is. A típust sikerrel alkalmazó pilóták között vannak ászok is

column4: aki 15 és fél győzelmet aratott Gladiatorral
column5: illetve az Angol Királyi Haditengerészet tisztje Charles Keighly-Peach
column6: aki a mediterrán térségben hajózó HMS Eagle fedélzetén szolgáló Swordfish pilótákat tanított vadásztaktikákra.";"글로스터 社의 글래디에이터(Gladiator)는 단발엔진의 단좌 전투기로
column7: 1937년에 영국 왕립 공군에 취역한 마지막 복엽 전투기입니다. 보다 현대적인 단엽기들의 그늘에 가리워 자주 간과되고는 있지만
column8: 여전히 이 기체는 사상 최고의 복엽기라고 부를만합니다.

column1: 글래디에이터가 생산되기 시작한 때는 이미 복엽기가 구시대적 디자인으로 취급되는 시대였지만
column2: 영국군은 전면전이 시작되기 전까지 새로운 단엽기를 개발하고 충분히 양산하지 못할 것을 우려하였습니다.

column1: 이전의 건틀릿(Gauntlet) 전투기의 성공을 발판삼아
column2: 글래디에이터는 노후화된 브리스톨 불독(Bristol Bulldog) 전투기를 대체하기 위해 개발되었습니다. 특징으로는 밀폐된 조종석
column3: 새로운 날개
column4: 좀 더 유선형을 그리는 고정된 하부구조
column5: 0.303인치 기관총 4정으로 증가된 무장 등이 있습니다. 초기에 생산된 231대의 글래디에이터 Mk I 는 영국 왕립 공군에 전달됩니다.

column1: Mk II 모델은 Mk I 모델에 사용되던 브리스톨 머큐리(Mercury) IX 엔진 대신에 830마력의 머큐리 VIIIA / AS 엔진을 탑재했습니다. 또한 여기에는 전기 스타트 모터
column2: 자동 연료혼합 조절기
column3: Vokes 사의 공기여과기를 장착했으며
column4: 구식의 목제 2날 프로펠러 대신 철제 3날 프로펠러를 달았습니다. 38대의 글래디에이터 Mk II들은 착함 고리를 부착해 해군에서 시 글래디에이터(Sea Gladiator)라는 이름으로 임시로 운용했으며
column5: 후에 60대의 완전한 해군용 개량형이 전달될 때까지 사용되었습니다. 해군용 개량형은 캐터펄트에 맞으면서 격납고 적재에 용이한 구조로 제작되었습니다.

column1: Gladiator выпускаўся як мадыфікацыя Gauntlet на замену састарэлым знішчальнікам-біпланам Bristol Bulldog. У ім былі перароблены крыло і стойкі шасі

column1: Мадыфікацыя Mk.II адрознівалася ад першай серыйнай мадэлі больш надзейным рухавіком Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS магутнасцю 830 к.с. замест Bristol Mercury IX такой самай магутнасці.
Усяго былі выпушчаны 717 самалётаў Gladiator
column2: 311 з якіх былі мадыфікацыі Mk.II.";"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column3: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column4: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: ;格羅斯特「鬥士」是一種單發單座戰鬥機，1937年起服役於皇家空軍。作為末代雙翼戰鬥機，儘管它經常處
於更現代的單翼機的陰影之下，它是否堪稱最優秀雙翼戰鬥機的爭論依然經久不息。
「鬥士」在投產時就已經公認過時了，但慮及戰爭全面爆發的時候英國恐怕來不及開發數量充足的單翼戰鬥
機，「鬥士」的生產才沒有中止。
「手套」戰鬥機的研製取得成功後，「鬥士」也進入研發序列，以取代老舊的布裡斯特「鬥牛犬」。
結果，「鬥士」採用了封閉座艙、新式機翼和更近流線型的固定起落架等設計，其武裝也增加到4挺.303機
槍。之後，最初一批交付給皇家空軍的「鬥士」Mk I型有231架。
MkII型採用了可靠性更高的布里斯托「水星」VIIIA/AS發動機，功率為830馬力。還安裝了電打火器、自動混合
燃料控制器、沃克斯空氣過濾器和一個用以取代早期木製雙葉槳的金屬三葉槳。有38架「鬥士」先驅被裝上
著艦鉤化身「海鬥士」，開始了在海軍航空隊的服役生涯。此後又有60架正式的海航版鬥士完成交付，它們
除帶有艦鉤外，還加裝了彈射裝置和橡皮艇收容器。
746架「鬥士」成機服役期間表現優異，它們在戰爭初期，特別是挪威戰役和馬耳他防禦戰中頗有建樹。
在「鬥士」上取得成功的飛行員包括皇家空軍首席王牌「帕特」帕特爾空軍少校，他在「鬥士」上的戰績是
確認擊落15架；還有皇家海軍查爾斯·肯利-皮奇海軍中校，他曾在「鷹」號航母於地中海執行任務期間，訓
練其「箭魚」僚機們在任務中套用空戰戰術。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column1: ;Le Gloster Gladiator est un chasseur monoplace qui est entré en service en 1937 dans la Royal Air Force comme le dernier avion de chasse biplan monomoteur. Souvent éclipsé par des monoplans plus modernes
column2: il reste sans doute le plus grand avion de chasse biplan de tous les temps.  La conception de ce biplan était déjà considérée comme obsolète au moment où a commencé sa production
column3: mais la Grande-Bretagne craignait de ne pas avoir le temps de développer des monoplans plus modernes en quantité suffisante avant le début de la guerre à grande échelle.  S'appuyant sur le succès antérieur du chasseur Gauntlet
column4: le Gladiator a été développé pour remplacer le vieillissant Bristol Bulldog. Doté d'un cockpit fermé
column5: de nouvelles ailes et d'un train d'atterrissage fixe rationalisé
column6: l'armement a été également porté à quatre mitrailleuses de 0
column7: 303 pouce. Au départ
column8: 231 Gladiator Mk Is ont été livrés à la RAF.  Le modèle Mk II avait le moteur plus fiable Mercure Bristol VIIIA de 830 chevaux en lieu et place du Mercury IX. Egalement équipé un démarreur électrique
column9: d'un contrôle de mélange automatique
column10: de filtres à air Vokes et d'une hélice tripale en métal en remplacement de l'ancienne bipale en bois. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs ont été également équipés de crochets d'appontage pour servir dans la Fleet Air Arm comme Sea Gladiators et jusqu'à 60 versions entièrement navalisées ont été également livrées
column11: montées avec des points d'accroche de catapulte et avec un arrimage de canot.  Un total de 746 Gladiator ont été produits et servirent avec distinction dans les premières phases de la guerre
column12: notamment lors de la campagne de Norvège et dans la défense de Malte. Parmi les meilleurs pilotes de Gladiator on retrouve l'As de la RAF
column13: Pattle « Pat » chef d'Escadron
column14: qui a marqué 15 ½ avions abattus confirmés et le Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column15: qui a formé plusieurs pilotes de Swordfish aux tactiques de chasse pour opérer depuis le HMS Eagle en Méditerranée.  ";"Il Gloster Gladiator è entrato in servizio nel 1937 come ultimo caccia biplano della Royal Air Force. Spesso oscurato dai più moderni monoplani
column16: rimase senza dubbio il miglior biplano di tutti i tempi.

column1: Il design era già considerato fin da quando fu sviluppato il Gladiator ma vi era la paura tra i Britannici che non vi fosse abbastanza tempo per sviluppare un più moderno monoplano in quantità sufficente prima dell'inizio della guerra.
Il Gladiator venne rilasciato come una modifica del Gauntlet
column2: rimpiazzando gli obsoleti caccia Bulldog. Le ali ed il carrello d'atterraggio vennero riprogettate
column3: la cabina di pilotaggio coperta
column4: aggiunti nuovi carrelli da una linea più aerodinamica e l'armamento aumentato a 4 mitragliatrici da 0.303 pollici.

column1: Inizialmente vennero messi in servizio 231 Gladiator Mk.I nella RAF.
Il modello Mk.II aveva un più affidabile motore Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS con una potenza di 830hp al posto del Mercury IX; a questo si aggiunse un motorino d'avviamento elettrico
column2: controllo della miscela automatico
column3: filtri dell'aria Vokes ed un'elica triplala in metallo come rimpiazzo delle bipala di legno. 38 Gladiator Mk.II vennero equipaggiati anche di gancio di arresto per le unità destinate alla Marina sotto la denominazione di Sea Gladiator
column4: successivamente il numerò venne incrementato a 60 come unità totalmente navalizzate predisposti per le catapulte.

column1: Vennero prodotti un totale di 746 Gladiator che servirono la Gran Bretagna fin dalle prime fasi della Guerra in particolare nella campagna Norvegese e nella difesa di Malta.
Tra i piloti che ottennero più abbattimenti con questo aereo vi furono il Capo Squadriglia: ""Pat"" Pattle
column2: con 15½ abbattimenti confermati ed il Comandante della Royal Navy: Chales Keighly-Peach che addestrò diversi dei suoi piloti di Swordfish in tattiche di caccia per operare dalla HMS Eagle nel Mediterraneo.";"Dieser Eintrag wird momentan überarbeitet und wird bald in einer verbesserten Version zur Verfügung stehen.

column1: Der Gloster Gladiator Doppeldecker war der letzte und der beste Doppeldecker der British Air Force.
Der Bau von Doppeldeckern galt zum Produktionsbeginn der Gladiator bereits als veraltet
column2: doch es war klar dass Großbritannien vor Beginn des 2. Weltkrieges für die Neuentwicklung und Massenproduktion von Eindeckern keine Zeit haben würde.

column1: Die Gladiator war eine Modifikation der Gauntlet und ersetzte den veralteten Bulldog-Doppeldecker. Flügel und Fahrwerk wurden verbessert
column2: das Cockpit abgedeckt und Landeklappen hinzugefügt. Auf Anfrage der Air Force wurde die Bewaffnung auf vier 7
column3: 7-mm-Maschinengewehre aufgestockt.

column1: Die Mk.II wurde vom zuverlässigeren Bristol Mercury / AS-Motor mit 830 PS angetrieben statt den Bristol Mercury IX (ebenfalls mit 830 PS) zu verwenden.
Insgesamt wurden 717 Gladiator produziert
column2: davon 311 modifizierte Gladiator Mk.II.";"The Gloster Gladiator biplane fighter was the last and best biplane of the British Air Force.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was clear that Britain might not have time to develop mass monoplane production before full-scale war began.

column1: The Gladiator was released as a modification of the Gauntlet
column2: replacing the obsolete Bulldog biplane fighter. The wing and landing gear were redesigned
column3: the cockpit covered
column4: and landing pads added. At the request of the Air Force
column5: the armament was increased to four 7.7 mm machine guns.

column1: The Mk.II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Bristol Mercury IX (which had the same horsepower).
A total of 717 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: 311 of which were the modified Gladiator Mk.II.";"Истребитель-биплан Глостер Гладиатор (Gloster Gladiator) был лучшим и последним бипланом
column3: стоявшим на вооружении британских ВВС.

column1: И хотя на момент начала производства ""Гладиатора"" конструкция бипланов уже была признана устаревшей

column1: Был выпущен как модификация Gauntlet для замены устаревших истребителей-бипланов Бульдог. Были переделаны крыло и стойки шасси; кабину пилота сделали закрытой
column2: а также добавили посадочные щитки. По требованию ВВС вооружение увеличили до четырёх 7
column3: 7-мм пулемётов.

column1: Модификация Mk.II отличалась от первой серийной модели более надежным двигателем Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS мощностью 830 л.с. вместо Bristol Mercury IX такой же мощности.
Всего было выпущено 717 самолётов Gladiator
column2: 311 из которых были модификации Mk.II.";"Gladiator był ostatnim samolotem myśliwskim o konstrukcji dwupłatowca dla brytyjskiego lotnictwa.

column1: Dwupłatowiec był już przestarzałą konstrukcją
column2: lecz Wielka Brytania nie miała czasu tuż przed wojną by opracować maszynę zdolną do walki. Brytyjskie ministerstwo lotnictwa zaleciło wytwórni po lotach próbnych
column3: zastosowanie do napędu samolotu silnika o większej mocy w celu zwiększenia jego osiągów. W wytwórni zdecydowano się na silnik gwiazdowy Bristol Mercury IX z dwułopatowym śmigłem drewnianym. Na jego uzbrojenie składały się 4 karabiny maszynowe kal. 7
column4: 7 mm. Samolot oznaczony jako Gloster Gladiator Mk I skierowano do produkcji seryjnej. W drugiej połowie 1937 roku zaczęto w samolocie stosować metalowe
column5: trójłopatowe śmigła.

column1: Obecny model z oznaczeniem F służył podczas agresji Niemiec na Francję w 1940
column2: kiedy to dwa dywizjony zostały do niej wysłane w celu pomocy w obronie kraju.

column1: W 1938 roku rozpoczęto produkcję kolejnej wersji samolotu Gloster Gladiator — Mk II
column2: który różnił się od poprzedniej wersji zastosowaniem silnika gwiazdowego Bristol Mercury VIIIA o mocy 830 KM. Produkcja wersji Mk II wyniosła 311 sztuk z 717 wyprodukowanych ogółem Gladiatorów";"Gloster Gladiator byl jednomotorový jednomístný stíhací letoun
column3: který byl uveden do služby v roce 1937 jako poslední dvojplošník Královského letectva. Ve stínu moderních jednoplošníků si udržel svůj status nejlepšího dvouplošníku všech dob.

column1: Konstrukce o dvou nosných plochách se považovala za zastaralou již v době
column2: kdy se Gladiator začal vyrábět. Británie se ale obávala
column3: že nebude mít dostatek času na vývoj moderního jednoplošníku v potřebném množství dříve
column4: než vypukne válka v plném rozsahu.

column1: Stavěli na úspěšném předchozím modelu stíhače jménem Gauntlet tak
column2: aby Gladiator mohl nahradit zastarávající Bristol Bulldog. Gladiator měl uzavřený kokpit
column3: nová křídla a aerodynamičtější pevný podvozek. Výzbroj byla posílena na čtyři kulomety ráže .303 palce. RAF obdržela první dodávku Gladiatorů Mk.I v počtu 231 kusů.

column1: Model Mk.II měl již spolehlivější motor Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS s výkonem až 830 koňských sil namísto motoru Bristol Mercury IX modelu Mk.I
column2: který byl také vybaven automatickým elektrickým startérem motoru
column3: automatickým nastavováním směsi paliva
column4: vzdušnými filtry firmy Vokes a třílistými vrtulemi
column5: které nahradily původní dvoulisté dřevěné vrtule. 38 letounů Gladiator Mk.II bylo vybaveno přistávacím hákem pro službu v námořních leteckých službách
column6: než bylo dodáno 60 plně vybavených kusů pro službu na letadlových lodích vybavených tak
column7: aby mohly startovat pomocí palubního katapultu a také byly vybaveny záchranným člunem.

column1: Celkem bylo vyrobeno 746 kusů různých verzí letounu Gladiator
column2: které sloužily při rozdílných nasazeních v počáteční fázi války. Mezi významné patří nasazení při Norské kampani
column3: či při obraně Malty. Mezi významné piloty Gladiatorů patří major letectva RAF „Pat“ Pattle s 15 potvrzenými setřely
column4: což je nejvíce sestřelů právě na tomto stroji a fregatní kapitán Královského námořnictva Charles Keighly-Peach
column5: který cvičil některé ze svých bývalých pilotů Swordfishů taktiku boje stíhače při operacích ve Středozemním moři z paluby HMS Eagle.";"1937'de İngiliz Kraliyet Hava kuvvetlerinde hizmete giren son çift kanatlı avcı uçağı olan Gloster Gladiator
column6: tek motorlu ve tek kişilikti. Sıklıkla tek kanatlı modern uçakların gölgesinde kalmış olsa da tartışmaya açık bir şekilde hâlâ tüm zamanların en muhteşem çift kanatlı avcı uçağıdır.

column1: Gladiator üretime başlandığında çift kanatlı uçak tasarımı zaten çağdışı olarak düşünülüyordu fakat Birleşik Krallığı’n topyekûn savaş başlamadan önce yeterli miktarda tek kanatlı modern uçak üretecek kadar zamanı olmamasından korkuluyordu.
Önceki Gauntlet avcısının başarısı üzerine inşa edilerek
column2: Gladiator yıllanan Bristol Bulldog'un yerini alması için geliştirildi. Kapalı bir pilot köşkü
column3: yeni kanatlar ve daha aerodinamik iniş takımları içeriyordu ayrıca silah sistemi de 4 adet 0.303 inch makinalı tüfek ile arttırıldı. Başlangıçta 231 Gladiotor Mk KHK’ya (RAF) teslim edildi.

column1: Mk II modeli
column2: MK I'in Mercury IX'u yerine 830 beygir gücünde daha güvenilir olan Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS motoruna sahipti. Bu motor ayrıca elektrikli marş motoru
column3: otomatik karışım kontrolü

column1: Toplamda 746 Gladiator uçağı üretildi ve savaşın ilk evrelerinde özellikle Norveç Seferi ve Malta Savunmasın ‘da temayüzle hizmet ettiler. Gladiator'de başarıya erişen pilotlar
column2: Gladiator'de onaylanmış 15 ½ öldürüşü olan KHK’nın en skorcu pilotu Filo Lideri 'Pat' Pattle ve Akdeniz'de HMS Eagle'dan harekât yapmak üzere Swordfish pilotlarından birkaçını eğiten Kraliyet Donanma Komutanı Charles Keigly-Peach'tir.

column1: ;格\t罗\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t1937 \t年\t起\t服\t役\t于\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t作\t为\t末\t代\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t尽\t管\t它\t经\t常\t处\t于\t更\t现\t代\t的\t单\t翼\t机\t的\t阴\t影\t之\t下\t，\t它\t是\t否\t堪\t称\t最\t优\t秀\t双\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t争\t论\t依\t然\t经\t久\t不\t息\t。\t
\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t在\t投\t产\t时\t就\t已\t经\t公\t认\t过\t时\t了\t，\t但\t虑\t及\t战\t争\t全\t面\t爆\t发\t的\t时\t候\t英\t国\t恐\t怕\t来\t不\t及\t开\t发\t数\t量\t充\t足\t的\t单\t翼\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t的\t生\t产\t才\t没\t有\t中\t止\t。\t

\t“\t手\t套\t”\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t研\t制\t取\t得\t成\t功\t后\t，\t趁\t热\t打\t铁\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t也\t进\t入\t研\t发\t序\t列\t，\t以\t取\t代\t老\t旧\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t特\t“\t斗\t牛\t犬\t”\t。\t结\t果\t，\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t采\t用\t了\t封\t闭\t座\t舱\t、\t新\t式\t机\t翼\t和\t更\t近\t流\t线\t型\t的\t固\t定\t起\t落\t架\t等\t设\t计\t，\t其\t武\t装\t也\t增\t加\t到\t 4 \t挺.303 \t机\t枪\t。\t之\t后\t，\t最\t初\t一\t批\t交\t付\t给\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t的\t“\t斗\t士\t”\tMk I \t型\t有\t 231 \t架\t。\t

Mk II \t型\t采\t用\t了\t可\t靠\t性\t更\t高\t的\t布\t里\t斯\t托\t“\t水\t星\t”\tVIIIA/AS \t发\t动\t机\t，\t功\t率\t为\t 830 \t马\t力\t。\t还\t安\t装\t了\t电\t打\t火\t器\t、\t自\t动\t混\t合\t燃\t料\t控\t制\t器\t、\t沃\t克\t斯\t空\t气\t过\t滤\t器\t和\t一\t个\t用\t以\t取\t代\t早\t期\t木\t制\t双\t叶\t桨\t的\t金\t属\t三\t叶\t桨\t。\t有\t 38 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t先\t驱\t被\t装\t上\t着\t舰\t钩\t化\t身\t“\t海\t斗\t士\t”\t，\t开\t始\t了\t在\t海\t军\t航\t空\t队\t的\t服\t役\t生\t涯\t。\t此\t后\t又\t有\t 60 \t架\t正\t式\t的\t海\t航\t版\t斗\t士\t完\t成\t交\t付\t，\t它\t们\t除\t带\t有\t舰\t钩\t外\t，\t还\t加\t装\t了\t弹\t射\t装\t置\t和\t橡\t皮\t艇\t收\t容\t器\t。\t

746 \t架\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t成\t机\t服\t役\t期\t间\t表\t现\t优\t异\t，\t它\t们\t在\t战\t争\t初\t期\t，\t特\t别\t是\t挪\t威\t战\t役\t和\t马\t耳\t他\t防\t御\t战\t中\t颇\t有\t建\t树\t。\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t取\t得\t成\t功\t的\t飞\t行\t员\t包\t括\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t首\t席\t王\t牌\t“\t帕\t特\t”\t帕\t特\t尔\t空\t军\t少\t校\t，\t他\t在\t“\t斗\t士\t”\t上\t的\t战\t绩\t是\t确\t认\t击\t落\t 15 \t架\t；\t还\t有\t皇\t家\t海\t军\t查\t尔\t斯\t·\t肯\t利\t-\t皮\t奇\t海\t军\t中\t校\t，\t他\t曾\t在\t“\t鹰\t”\t号\t航\t母\t于\t地\t中\t海\t执\t行\t任\t务\t期\t间\t，\t训\t练\t其\t“\t箭\t鱼\t”\t僚\t机\t们\t在\t任\t务\t中\t应\t用\t空\t战\t战\t术\t。";"グロスター グラディエーターは、\t1937年に\tイギリス\t空軍の\t最後の\t複葉戦闘機として\t使用された、\t単発単座戦闘機で、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機よりしばしば\t見劣りしていると\t考えれられていましたが、\t史上最高の\t複葉戦闘機であることはほぼ\t間違いありません。\t
グラディエーターの\t製造時には、\t既に\t複葉機の\t設計は\t時代遅れであると\t考えられていましたが、\t大戦が\t始まる\t前に、\tより\t現代的な\t単葉機を\t十分な\t数開発できる\t時間が\tイギリスには\t残されていないという\t懸念があったのです。\t

初期の\tゴーントレット\t戦闘機の\t成功を\t基に、\t老朽化した\tブリストル ブルドッグと\t入れ\t替えるために\tグラディエーターは\t開発されました。\t密閉型操縦室、\t新しい\t翼、\tより\t流線形となった\t改良された\t着陸装置が\t特徴で、\t武装は\t4挺の\t0.303\tインチ\t機関銃へと\t拡大されました。\t最初に\t231機の\tグラディエーター\tMk Isが\tイギリス\t空軍へと\t送られました。\t

グラディエーター\tMk II\t型には、\tMk I\t型の\tマーキュリー IX\tエンジンの\t代わりに、\tより\t信頼性の\t高い\t830馬力出力可能な\tブリストル・マーキュリー\tVIIIA / AS\tエンジンが\t搭載されました。\tまた、\t電気始動装置、\t自動混合制御装置、\tヴォークス\t社製\tエアフィルター、\t初期の\t木製\t2枚刃と\t入れ\t替えるために、\t金属製\t3枚刃も\t搭載されています。\t38機の\tグラディエーター\tMk II\t型は\tシーグラディエーターという\t名称で\t艦隊航空隊での\t任務に\t就くべく\tアレスター・フックが\t備え\t付けられ、\tカタパルトポイントと\tゴムボートを\t搭載し、\t完全に\t艦上機の\t改造が\t施された\t60機も\t輸送されました。\t

合計で\t746機の\tグラディエーター\t航空機が\t製造され、\t戦争開始時から、\t主に\tノルウェーの\t戦いや\tマルタ\t包囲戦で\t使用されました。\tグラディエーターを\t操縦して\t成功を\t掴んだ\tパイロットには、\tグラディエーターで\t確定撃墜数\t15 ½を\tマークした、\tイギリス\t空軍の\tトップ・エースであり\t分隊\tリーダーでもある“パット”・パトルや、\t地中海で\tHMS\tイーグルから\t戦闘機を\t操縦するために、\t複数の\tソードフィッシュの\tパイロットを\t訓練した、\tイギリス\t海軍指揮官である\tチャールズ・ケイリー・ピーチがいます。";"O Gloster Gladiator era um caça monomotor
column2: de um único tripulante
column3: que entrou em serviço em 1937 como o último caça biplano da Força Aérea Real. Muitas vezes ofuscado por monoplanos mais modernos
column4: ainda permaneceu indiscutivelmente o maior caça biplano de todos os tempos.

column1: O projeto dos biplanos já era considerado ultrapassado quando começou a produção do Gladiator
column2: mas temia-se que a Grã-Bretanha nao teria tempo para desenvolver monoplanos mais modernos em quantidades suficientes
column3: antes da guerra em grande escala começar.

column1: Aproveitando o sucesso do caça anterior Gauntlet
column2: o Gladiator foi desenvolvido para substituir o velho Bristol Bulldog. Apresentando um cockpit fechado
column3: novas asas e um trem de aterragem fixo mais aerodinâmico
column4: o armamento também foi aumentado para quatro metralhadoras de 0
column5: 303 polegadas. Inicialmente
column6: 231 Gladiator Mk Is foram entregues para a RAF.

column1: O modelo Mk II tinha o mais confiável Bristol Mercury VIII / como motor com uma potência de 830 cavalos no lugar do Mk I Mercury IX; Este também foi equipado com um motor de partida elétrico
column2: controle automático de mistura
column3: filtro de ar Vokes e uma hélice com três pás de metal para substituir a variante inicial de duas pás de madeira. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs também foram equipados com prendedores de ganchos para servir o Fleet Air Arm como Sea Gladiators até 60 variantes totalmente navais também foram entregues
column4: os últimos sendo equipados com pontos de catapulta e acondicionamento de um bote.

column1: Um total de 746 aeronaves Gladiators foram produzidas e serviram com distinção na fase de abertura da guerra
column2: notavelmente durante a campanha norueguesa e na defesa de Malta. Pilotos que alcançaram sucesso no Gladiator incluiu-se o melhor marcador e Líder de Esquadrão
column3: Pattle 'Pat'
column4: que marcou 15 ½ mortes confirmadas em Gladiators e o Comandante Real Naval Charles Keighly-Peach
column5: quem treinou vários pilotos em seus Swordfish em táticas de caça para operar a partir do HMS Eagle no Mediterrâneo.  ";"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column6: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column7: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: ;Винищувач-біплан Глостер Гладіатор (Gloster Gladiator) був кращим і останнім біпланом
column2: що стояли на озброєнні британських ВПС.

column1: І хоча на момент початку виробництва ""Гладіатора"" конструкція біпланів вже була визнана застарілою
column2: було ясно
column3: що Великобританія може не встигнути розгорнути масове виробництво монопланів до початку великомасштабної війни.

column1: Був випущений як модифікація Gauntlet для заміни застарілих винищувачів-біпланів Бульдог. Були перероблені крило і стійки шасі; кабіну пілота зробили закритою
column2: а також додали посадочні щитки. На вимогу ВПС озброєння збільшили до чотирьох 7
column3: 7-мм кулеметів.

column1: Модифікація Mk.II відрізнялася від першої серійної моделі більш надійним двигуном Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS потужністю 830 к.с. замість Bristol Mercury IX такої ж потужності.
Всього було випущено 717 літаків Gladiator
column2: 311 з яких були модифікації Mk.II. ";"Gloster Gladiator je bio jednomotorni lovac jednosed koji je ušao u službu 1937. godine kao poslednji dvokrilac Kraljevskog ratnog vazduhoplovsvta. Iako često u senci modernih jednokrilaca
column3: ipak je ostao upamćen kao verovatno najbolji lovac dvokrilac svih vremena.

column1: Dizajn dvokrilaca se uveliko smatrao zastarelim u trenutku kad se pristupilo proizvodnji Glostera
column2: ali postojao je strah da nema dovoljno vremena da se razviju moderniji jednokrilci u dovoljnim količinama pre nego što se rat zahukta.

column1: Nastavljajući uspeh prethodnog lovca
column2: Gauntleta
column3: Gladiator je razvijan kako bi zamenio vremešnog Bristol Bulldoga. Imao je zatvorenu pilotsku kabinu
column4: nova krila
column5: i aerodinamičniji fiksni stajni trap dok je naoružanje takođe povećano na četiri mitraljeza kalibra 0.303. Najpre  je 231 komad Gladiatora Mk I isporučeno RAF-u.

column1: Model Mk II je posedovao pouzdaniji Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS motor od 830 konjske snage dok je na modelu Mk I bio motor Mercury IX: Takođe je bio opremljen električnim starter motorom
column2: automatskom kontrolom mešavine
column3: Vokes filterom za vazduh i metalna trokraka elisa je zamenila raniju drvenu dvokraku. 38 komada Gladiatora Mk II je bilo opremljeno kukom za službu u vazdušnim snagama Mornarice pod imenom Sea Gladiator dok nije isporučeno 60 komada potpuno namenjenih mornarici koji su bili opremljeni vezovima za brodski katapult i gumenim čamcima za spasavanje.

column1: Ukupno je proizvedeno 746 Gladiatora koji su imali zapaženu ulogu u početnim fazama rata
column2: posebno tokom norveške kampanje i u odbrani Malte.  Među pilotima koji su bili uspešni sa Gladiatorima su najveći as RAF-a
column3: vođa eskadrile ‘Pat’ Pattle sa 15 ½ potvrđenih obaranja u Gladiatoru i komandir kraljevske mornarice Charles Keighly-Peach koji je obučavao neke svoje pilote
column4: koji su leteli na avionima tipa  Swordfish
column5: lovačkim tatktikama za dejstva sa broda HMS Eagle u mediteranu.

column1: ;A Gloster Gladiator egy együléses egymotoros vadászgép volt
column2: mely 1937-ben állt szolgálatba a RAF utolsó kétfedeles típusaként. Gyakran csak a modern egyfedelű típusokat emelik ki
column3: de a Gladiator vitathatatlanul minden idők legnagyszerűbb kétfedelűje volt.

column1: A kétfedelű gépek már a Gladiator sorozatgyártásának kezdetén is elavultnak számítottak
column2: de akkor úgy látszott
column3: hogy Nagy Britanniának nem lesz ideje egy modern típust kifejleszteni és sorozatgyártásba vinni a totális háború beállta előtt.

column1: A korábbi Gauntlet sikerére építve
column2: a Gladiator-t a kiöregedő Bristol Bulldog leváltására tervezték. Zárt pilótafülke
column3: új szárnyak és jobban áramvonalazott merev futószárak jellemezték. A fegyverzetet is megnövelték négy 0.303 inch űrméretű géppuskára. Kezdetben 231 Gladiator Mk I-t szállítottak le a RAF-nak.

column1: A Mk II-t  a Mk I Mercury IX helyett a sokkal megbízhatóbb Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS motorral szerelték fel
column2: melynek 830 lóerős teljesítménye volt. Elektromos indítóberendezéssel
column3: automata keverékszabályzóval
column4: Vokes légszűrővel és a korábbi kétágú falégcsavar helyett háromágú fém légcsavarral látták el. 38 fékezőhoroggal felszerelt Mk II-t kapott a flotta
column5: amíg megérkezett a 60 navalizált példány is
column6: melyeket később katapult csatlakozópontokkal és mentőcsónakkal szereltek fel.

column1: Összesen 746 Gladiator készült és szolgált a háború elején
column2: melyek részt vettek többek között Norvégia és Málta védelmében is. A típust sikerrel alkalmazó pilóták között vannak ászok is
column3: mint ""Pat"" Pattle
column4: aki 15 és fél győzelmet aratott Gladiatorral
column5: illetve az Angol Királyi Haditengerészet tisztje Charles Keighly-Peach
column6: aki a mediterrán térségben hajózó HMS Eagle fedélzetén szolgáló Swordfish pilótákat tanított vadásztaktikákra.

column1: ;글로스터 社의 글래디에이터(Gladiator)는 단발엔진의 단좌 전투기로
column2: 1937년에 영국 왕립 공군에 취역한 마지막 복엽 전투기입니다. 보다 현대적인 단엽기들의 그늘에 가리워 자주 간과되고는 있지만
column3: 여전히 이 기체는 사상 최고의 복엽기라고 부를만합니다.

column1: 글래디에이터가 생산되기 시작한 때는 이미 복엽기가 구시대적 디자인으로 취급되는 시대였지만
column2: 영국군은 전면전이 시작되기 전까지 새로운 단엽기를 개발하고 충분히 양산하지 못할 것을 우려하였습니다.

column1: 이전의 건틀릿(Gauntlet) 전투기의 성공을 발판삼아
column2: 글래디에이터는 노후화된 브리스톨 불독(Bristol Bulldog) 전투기를 대체하기 위해 개발되었습니다. 특징으로는 밀폐된 조종석
column3: 새로운 날개
column4: 좀 더 유선형을 그리는 고정된 하부구조
column5: 0.303인치 기관총 4정으로 증가된 무장 등이 있습니다. 초기에 생산된 231대의 글래디에이터 Mk I 는 영국 왕립 공군에 전달됩니다.

column1: Mk II 모델은 Mk I 모델에 사용되던 브리스톨 머큐리(Mercury) IX 엔진 대신에 830마력의 머큐리 VIIIA / AS 엔진을 탑재했습니다. 또한 여기에는 전기 스타트 모터
column2: 자동 연료혼합 조절기
column3: Vokes 사의 공기여과기를 장착했으며
column4: 구식의 목제 2날 프로펠러 대신 철제 3날 프로펠러를 달았습니다. 38대의 글래디에이터 Mk II들은 착함 고리를 부착해 해군에서 시 글래디에이터(Sea Gladiator)라는 이름으로 임시로 운용했으며
column5: 후에 60대의 완전한 해군용 개량형이 전달될 때까지 사용되었습니다. 해군용 개량형은 캐터펄트에 맞으면서 격납고 적재에 용이한 구조로 제작되었습니다.

column1: 총 746대의 글래디에이터 기체가 생산되었고

column1: Gladiator выпускаўся як мадыфікацыя Gauntlet на замену састарэлым знішчальнікам-біпланам Bristol Bulldog. У ім былі перароблены крыло і стойкі шасі

column1: Мадыфікацыя Mk.II адрознівалася ад першай серыйнай мадэлі больш надзейным рухавіком Bristol Mercury VIIIA/AS магутнасцю 830 к.с. замест Bristol Mercury IX такой самай магутнасці.
Усяго былі выпушчаны 717 самалётаў Gladiator
column2: 311 з якіх былі мадыфікацыі Mk.II.";"The Gloster Gladiator was a single engine
column3: single seat fighter which entered service in 1937 as the Royal Air Force’s last biplane fighter. Often overshadowed by more modern monoplanes
column4: it still remained arguably the greatest biplane fighter of all time.

column1: Biplane design was already considered outdated by the time production of the Gladiator started
column2: but it was feared that Britain might not have time to develop more modern monoplanes in sufficient quantities before full scale war began.

column1: Building on the success of the earlier Gauntlet fighter
column2: the Gladiator was developed to replace the aging Bristol Bulldog. Featuring an enclosed cockpit
column3: new wings and a more streamlined fixed undercarriage
column4: the armament was also increased to four 0.303 inch machine guns. Initially
column5: 231 Gladiator Mk Is were delivered to the RAF.

column1: The Mk II model had the more reliable Bristol Mercury VIIIA / AS engine with an output of 830 horsepower in place of the Mk I’s Mercury IX; this was also fitted with an electrical starter motor
column2: automatic mixture control
column3: Vokes air filter and a metal three bladed propeller to replace the earlier wooden two bladed variant. 38 Gladiator Mk IIs were also fitted with arrestor hooks to serve in the Fleet Air Arm as Sea Gladiators until 60 fully navalised variants were also delivered
column4: the latter being fitted with catapult points and a dinghy stowage.

column1: A total of 746 Gladiator aircraft were produced
column2: and served with distinction in the opening phases of the war
column3: notably during the Norwegian Campaign and in the defence of Malta. Pilots who achieved success in the Gladiator included the RAF’s top scorer
column4: Squadron Leader ‘Pat’ Pattle
column5: who scored 15 ½ confirmed kills in Gladiators
column6: and Royal Navy Commander Charles Keighly-Peach
column7: who trained several of his Swordfish pilots in fighter tactics to operate from HMS Eagle in the Mediterranean.

column1: ;格羅斯特「鬥士」是一種單發單座戰鬥機，1937年起服役於皇家空軍。作為末代雙翼戰鬥機，儘管它經常處
於更現代的單翼機的陰影之下，它是否堪稱最優秀雙翼戰鬥機的爭論依然經久不息。
「鬥士」在投產時就已經公認過時了，但慮及戰爭全面爆發的時候英國恐怕來不及開發數量充足的單翼戰鬥
機，「鬥士」的生產才沒有中止。
「手套」戰鬥機的研製取得成功後，「鬥士」也進入研發序列，以取代老舊的布裡斯特「鬥牛犬」。
結果，「鬥士」採用了封閉座艙、新式機翼和更近流線型的固定起落架等設計，其武裝也增加到4挺.303機
槍。之後，最初一批交付給皇家空軍的「鬥士」Mk I型有231架。
MkII型採用了可靠性更高的布里斯托「水星」VIIIA/AS發動機，功率為830馬力。還安裝了電打火器、自動混合
燃料控制器、沃克斯空氣過濾器和一個用以取代早期木製雙葉槳的金屬三葉槳。有38架「鬥士」先驅被裝上
著艦鉤化身「海鬥士」，開始了在海軍航空隊的服役生涯。此後又有60架正式的海航版鬥士完成交付，它們
除帶有艦鉤外，還加裝了彈射裝置和橡皮艇收容器。
746架「鬥士」成機服役期間表現優異，它們在戰爭初期，特別是挪威戰役和馬耳他防禦戰中頗有建樹。
在「鬥士」上取得成功的飛行員包括皇家空軍首席王牌「帕特」帕特爾空軍少校，他在「鬥士」上的戰績是
確認擊落15架；還有皇家海軍查爾斯·肯利-皮奇海軍中校，他曾在「鷹」號航母於地中海執行任務期間，訓
練其「箭魚」僚機們在任務中套用空戰戰術。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

encyclopedia/lancaster_mk3/desc;"With RAF Bomber Command’s focus being centred on the strategic bombing campaign against German industry
column2: the RAF desperately required a force of heavy bombers to increase the capability provided by their medium bomber fleet. A twin engine Avro Manchester bomber was converted to be powered by four engines and first flown in January 1941. This and subsequent prototypes were deemed to be so successful that the first production variant of the new bomber
column3: now named the Lancaster
column4: was flown in October 1941.

column1: The immediate success of the Lancaster Mk I (redesignated the BI in 1942) caused it to be pushed ahead in terms of production priorities. In turn
column2: this threatened the supply of Rolls Royce Merlin engines which powered it
column3: so alternative engines needed to be sourced. The BII was powered by Bristol Hercules engines
column4: but this caused a drop in performance and payload. The BIII was powered by Packard Merlin engines
column5: a license built version manufactured in the United States. Internal differences between the BI and BIII were very few; the two models had near identical technical characteristics and armament and externally the BIII had only a larger bomb aimer’s bubble window
column6: but the change in designation was necessary since the different engines had different servicing requirements.

column1: The Lancaster was first used operationally in March 1942 by No. 44 Squadron. It soon became the backbone of RAF Bomber Command’s offensive against the heart of Germany
column2: but was also used against targets all across occupied Europe. The majority of Lancaster operations took place at night
column3: due to RAF Bomber Command’s policy of night bombing whilst the bombers of the United States Army Air Force tackled targets by day.

column1: For defence
column2: the Lancaster had eight 0.303 inch Colt-Browning Mk.II machine guns located in three turrets: two guns were located in the nose
column3: two in the dorsal turret
column4: and four in the tail turret. The maximum ordinance capacity of the Lancaster was the highest of any heavy bomber in World War II: 14
column6: 356 kg). Besides standard bombs
column7: the aircraft could carry an 8
column9: 632 kg) ""blockbuster"" or two 4
column11: 816 kg) high-explosive ""cookie"" bombs. Special modifications of the bomber could carry even larger bombs
column12: such as the 22
column13: 000 lb ‘Grand Slam’ bomb. The Lancaster became legendary on the night of May 17th 1943 when bombers of No 617 Squadron breached the Mohne and Eder dams in Germany with Barnes Wallis’ genius ‘bouncing bomb’. Lancasters of Nos 9 and 617 Squadrons also sank the German battleship ‘Tirpitz’ with 12
column14: 000 lb ‘Tallboy’ bombs
column15: also designed by Wallis.

column1: A total of 3
column2: 039 BIII bombers were produced. The bomber was finally decommissioned in Great Britain in 1950
column3: and is a serious contender to the claim of being the most capable bomber of the entire war.

column6: mais la différence de dénomination était nécessaire à partir du moment où les différents moteurs ont des exigences de service différents.

column9: le Tirpitz.

Il Lancaster Mk.III

column5: o 224. Furono invece presi in licenza dalla Packard motori americani equivalenti. Le differenze interne tra l'Mk.I e l0.Mk.III erano molto poche. I due modelli avevano caratteristiche tecniche e armamento identici

column1: Il Lancaster combatté per la prima volta nel marzo 1942. Divenne subito la base delle operazioni di bombardamento britanniche e partecipò a imponenti raid di bombardamento su Germania

La capacità massima di ordinanza del Lancaster era più alta di ogni altro bombardiere pesante durante la Seconda Guerra Mondiale: 14.000 lb (6356 kg). Oltre alle bombe standard l'aereo poteva trasportare bombe ""blockbuster"" da 8000 lb (3632 kg) oppure due bombe ""cookie"" altamente esplosive 4000 lb (1816 kg). Speciali modifiche del bombardiere erano in grado di trasportare bombe anche più grandi. Une delle operazioni più riuscite del Lancaster fu l'affondamento della nave ammiraglia tedesca
column5: la Tirpitz.

column1: Die Lancaster wurde zum ersten Mal im März 1942 eingesetzt. Bald darauf wurde sie das Fundament der britischen Bomberoperationen und war massiv an Bombenangriffen über Deutschland
column2: Italien und Frankreich beteiligt. Aufgrund der Mittelmäßigkeit ihrer Abwehrwaffen wurde sie vor allem bei Nachtangriffen eingesetzt.

column1: Zur Verteidigung hatte die Lancaster acht Colt-Browning Mk.II 7
column2: 7-mm-Maschinengewehre in drei Geschütztürmen: Zwei MGs waren am Bug
column3: zwei an der Rumpfoberseite und vier am Heck installiert. Die maximale Ladekapazität der Lancaster war die höchste aller schweren Bomber des Zweiten Weltkriegs: 14.000 Pfund (6.356 kg). Neben den normalen Bomben konnte das Flugzeug eine 8.000-Pfund (3.632 kg) 'Blockbuster' oder zwei 4.000-Pfund (1.816 kg) hochexplosive 'Cookie'-Bomben mit sich führen. Sonderanfertigungen des Bombers konnten sogar noch größere Bomben laden. Eine der erfolgreichsten Operationen der Lancaster war die Versenkung der Tripit
column4: das Flaggschiff der deutschen Kriegsmarine.

column1: Ланкастеры впервые приняли участие в боевых действиях в марте 1942 г. А уже с середины того же года самолёт стал основным британским тяжёлым бомбардировщиком и участвовал в массированных налетах на территории Германии
column2: Италии и Франции
column3: применяясь преимущественно как ночной бомбардировщик. Связано это было прежде всего с недостаточной мощностью оборонительного вооружения.

column1: Оборонительное вооружение

column4: располагалось в трёх механизированных башенных турелях: по два в носовой и верхней и четыре в кормовой. Максимальная бомбовая нагрузка Ланкастера была рекордной для тяжёлых бомбардировщиков Второй мировой войны: 14000 фунтов (6356 кг). Помимо обычных бомб
column5: самолёт мог нести 8000-фунтовый (3632 кг) ""блокбастер"" (blockbuster) или две 4000-фунтовые (1816 кг) сверхтяжёлые бомбы (high explosive) типа ""cookie"". Специально оборудованные самолёты могли поднимать бомбы ещё больших калибров. К одной из самых успешных операций
column6: проведённых ими

column1: Był używany głównie w nalotach nocnych ze względu na słabe uzbrojenie. Składało się ono z ośmiu karabinów maszynowych Colt-Browning kal. 7

Maksymalny ładunek bomb w bombowcu Lancaster był największy w maszynach pochodzących z II wojny światowej: 6 356 kg (14 000 lb). Oprócz standardowych bomb mógł przenosić jedną ciężką bombę o wadze 3 632 kg lub 2 o wadze 1 816 kg każda. Specjalne modyfikacje mogły przenosić cięższe bomby np. bombę „Grand Slam” o wadze 9 979 kg.

column1: Jedną z najsłynniejszych operacji było zatopienie flagowego statku niemieckiej marynarki pancernika Tirpitz. W 1943 roku zmodyfikowano wersję B Mk III z 617 Dywizjonu „Dambusters” („Niszczyciele Tam”) utworzonego w celu zniszczenia tam na Ruhrze. Przenosiły poprzecznie zamontowane
column2: rotujące lewoskrętnie bomby skaczące. W tym celu usunięto drzwi komory bombowej oraz wieżyczkę grzbietową. Zamontowano specjalne urządzenie do nadawania ruchu wirowego bombom
column3: jeszcze przed ich zrzutem. Ponadto w komorze bombowej i pod nosem zamontowano lampy do oceny wysokości lotu nad powierzchnią. Przebudowano w ten sposób 21 maszyn. Podczas akcji
column4: w której wzięło ostatecznie udział 19 bombowców

column1: W sumie wyprodukowano 3 039 egzemplarzy bombowca Lancaster Mk III. Bombowiec został wycofany ze służby w 1950 roku.
;Když Bombardovací velitelství RAF začalo plánovat strategické bombardování německých průmyslových oblastí
column2: RAF nutně potřebovalo doplnit své stavy středních bombardérů novými těžkými bombardéry
column3: které by zvýšily současné operační možnosti. Výsledkem bylo překonstruování dvoumotorového bombardéru Avro Manchester na čtyřmotorový. Tato nová verze poprvé vzlétla v lednu 1941 a spolu s následujícími prototypy byla pokládána za úspěšnou
column4: takže od října započala výroba nového typu bombardéru nazvaného Lancaster.

column1: Okamžitý úspěch Lancasteru Mk.I (od 1942 označován B.I) způsobil jeho posun ve výrobních prioritách. Výroba však byla ohrožena dodávkami motorů Rolls Royce Merlin
column2: které je poháněly
column3: takže bylo nutné najít alternativu. Verze BII byla poháněna motory Bristol Hercules
column4: což ovšem vyústilo v pokles výkonu a nosnosti. Další série BIII byla osazena americkými motory Packard Merlin. Vnitřní rozdíly mezi B.I a B.III byly velmi malé; oba měly téměř identické technické parametry i výzbroj. B.III měla pouze větší zaměřovací průzor pro bombometčíka
column5: ale změna označení byla nutná
column6: jelikož rozdílné typy motoru měly jiné servisní požadavky.

column1: Lancastery byly poprvé bojově využity v březnu 1942
column2: a to perutí č. 44. Brzy se staly hlavními bombardéry RAF při ofenzívě proti srdci Německa
column3: stejně jako při útocích na cíle po celé okupované Evropě. Většina jejich operací se konala v noci
column4: a to kvůli příkazu vedení RAF. Zatímco RAF zajišťovala noční bombardovací akce
column5: denní bombardování zajišťovaly bombardéry USAAF.

column1: Pro svou obranu disponovaly Lancastery osmi 7
column2: 7 mm kulomety Colt-Browning Mk.II
column3: rozdělenými do tří věží. Dva kulomety byly ve věži v nosní části letadla
column4: další dva ve věži nahoře za kokpitem a zbylé čtyři v ocasní věži. Maximální nosnost Lancasterů byla nejvyšší ze všech těžkých bombardérů druhé světové války
column5: 14 000 liber (6 536 kg). Kromě standardních pum mohly nést pumu ""Blockbuster"" o hmotnosti 8 000 liber (3 632 kg)
column6: nebo dvě vysoce explozivní pumy ""Cookie"" o poloviční hmotnosti. Speciální modifikace Lancasterů mohly nést ještě těžší pumy
column7: jako třeba 20 000 liber (9 072 kg) vážící pumu ""Grand Slam"". Lancastery se zapsaly do dějin noci 17. května 1943
column8: kdy bombardéry z 617. letky poškodily německé přehrady Möhne a Eder za pomocí speciálních ""skákavých bomb"" Barnese Wallise. Lancastery z 9. a 617. letky také potopily německou bitevní loď Tirpitz za pomocí 12 000 liber (5 448 kg) vážících pum ""Tallboy""
column9: které rovněž navrhl Wallis.

column1: Celkem bylo vyrobeno 3039 bombardérů B.III. Ze služby byly vyřazeny až v roce 1950 a dodnes jsou považovány jako nejschopnější bombardéry celé války.
Na Lancasteru Mk.III bojově létali dva Čechoslováci. Navigátor F/Lt Jan Robert Alexander
column2: DFC
column3: DFM vykonal během války nejvíce bombardovacích náletů ze všech Čechoslováků. Ze 101 vykonaných náletů odlétal 40 v Lancasteru Mk.III u 106. a 83. perutě. Druhým Čechoslovákem byl P/O Jiří Otto Fischl
column4: který jako operátor přístroje ABC (rušící německé palubní radiostanice FUG 16) odlétal u 101. perutě 14 náletů. 16. února 1944 byl jeho Lancaster Mk.III sestřelen a Fischl upadl do zajetí.";"KHK'nın (RAF) Bombardıman Komutanlığı'nın odak noktası Alman sanayisine karşı stratejik bombalama merkezli olmasıyla
column5: KHK orta sınıf bombardıman uçak filosu tarafından sağlanan desteği arttırmak için umutsuzca ağır bombardıman uçaklarına ihtiyaç duydu. Çift motorlu bombardıman uçağı olan Avro Machester 4 motorla güçlendirilmek üzere dönüştürüldü ve ilk Ocak 1941 de uçtu. Bu ve sonraki ilk örnekler o kadar başarılı olarak görüldü ki yeni bombacının ilk sürümü (şimdilerde Lancaster olarak isimlendirildi) Ekim 1941'de uçtu.

column1: Lancester Mk I'in (1942'de BI olarak tekrar tasarlandı) ani başarısı üretim öncelikleri açısından öne alınmasına sebep oldu. Dolayısıyla ona güç veren Rolls Royce Merlin motorlarının tedariki tehdit altına girdi bu yüzden alternatif motor kaynaklarına ihtiyaç duyuldu. BII Bristol Hercules motorları tarafından güçlendirildi fakat bu performans ve taşıma kapasitesinde düşüşe sebep oldu. BIII
column2: patentli sürümü Birleşik Devletlerde üretilen Packard Merlin motorları ile güçlendirildi. BI ve BIII arasındaki iç donanım farkları çok azdı. Her iki modelde de nerede ise aynı teknik özellikler
column3: aynı silah donanımları ve bunun haricinde BIII'ün bomba nişancısının kabarık penceresi az daha büyüktü fakat farklı motorları ve farklı servis alanları olduğundan numaralandırmadaki değişiklik gerekliydi.

column1: Lancaster görev temelli olarak ilk defa Mart 1942'de 44. Hava Filosu tarafından kullanıldı. Kısa sürede Almanya'nın kalbine karşı olan hücumlarda KHK Bombardıman Kumandanlığının belkemiği oldu fakat aynı zamanda işgal edilmiş Avrupa'nın tamamındaki hedeflere karşı da kullanıldı. Birleşik Devletler Ordusu Hava Kuvvetleri hedefleri gündüz vakti yok ederken KHK Bombardıman Kumandanlığının ilkesi gece bombardımanı olduğundan Lancaster görevlerinin büyük bir kısmı geceleri gerçekleşti.
Savunma için Lancester'da 2 silah burunda
column2: 2 tane sırt taretinde
column3: ve dört tane kuyruk taretinde olmak üzere 3 tarete yerleştirilmiş toplam 8 tane 0.303 inch Colt Browning Mk.II'ye sahipti. Lancaster'ın azami silah kapasitesi (14
column5: 356)) İkinci Dünya Savaşı'ndaki herhangi bir bombardıman uçağının en yükseği idi. Diğer normal bombaların aksine bu hava aracı
column8: 632 kg) ""blockbuster"" bombası ya da iki tane 4
column10: 816 kg) yüksek patlayıcı ""cookie"" bombası taşıyabilirdi. Bombardımanın uçağının özel modifikasyonlu hali daha büyük bombalar taşıyabilirdi örneğin 22
column11: 000 lb "" Grand Slam"" bombası gibi. 17 Mayıs 1943'te 617 numaralı bombardıman filosu Barnes Wallis'in ""bouncing bombası"" ile Mohbe ve Eder barajlarını delik deşik ettikleri gece Lancaster efsanevi oldu. 9 ve 617 numaralı Lancaster filoları ayrıca Alman savaş gemisi ""Tirpitz"" i gene Wallis tarafından tasarlanan 12
column12: 000 lb ""Tallboy"" bombaları ile batırdılar.

column1: Toplamda 3
column2: 039 BIII bombardıman uçağı üretildi. Nihayet 1950 yılında Büyük Britanya'da hizmetten çıkarıldı ve tüm savaş boyunca en yetenekli bombardıman uçağı olma iddiasında ciddi bir rakip oldu.

column1: ;在\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t轰\t炸\t机\t指\t挥\t部\t专\t注\t于\t对\t德\t国\t工\t业\t实\t体\t进\t行\t战\t略\t轰\t炸\t时\t，\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t总\t部\t正\t如\t饥\t似\t渴\t地\t寻\t觅\t一\t支\t重\t型\t轰\t炸\t机\t军\t团\t，\t以\t提\t高\t现\t有\t的\t由\t中\t型\t轰\t炸\t机\t编\t队\t提\t供\t的\t杯\t水\t车\t薪\t的\t投\t弹\t量\t。\t由\t双\t发\t的\t艾\t芙\t罗\t“\t曼\t彻\t斯\t特\t”\t轰\t炸\t机\t改\t装\t成\t的\t四\t发\t机\t应\t运\t而\t生\t，\t并\t于\t 1941 \t年\t 1 \t月\t完\t成\t首\t飞\t。\t该\t机\t与\t随\t后\t试\t验\t机\t的\t成\t功\t，\t促\t成\t该\t机\t型\t作\t为\t一\t款\t新\t型\t轰\t炸\t机\t，\t于\t 1941 \t年\t 10 \t月\t的\t定\t型\t投\t产\t，\t当\t然\t，\t此\t时\t它\t们\t有\t了\t新\t名\t字\t—\t—\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\t。\t

\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\tMk I\t（\t1942 \t年\t重\t新\t定\t名\t为\t B Mk I\t）\t的\t耀\t眼\t表\t现\t使\t其\t生\t产\t优\t先\t级\t骤\t提\t，\t这\t反\t过\t来\t也\t引\t起\t驱\t动\t它\t的\t罗\t-\t罗\t“\t灰\t背\t隼\t”\t引\t擎\t的\t短\t缺\t，\t于\t是\t所\t有\t能\t淘\t换\t到\t的\t发\t动\t机\t都\t被\t塞\t进\t去\t试\t验\t了\t。\tB Mk II \t使\t用\t的\t是\t布\t里\t斯\t托\t“\t武\t仙\t座\t”\t发\t动\t机\t，\t但\t其\t性\t能\t和\t载\t弹\t量\t因\t此\t降\t低\t了\t。\tB Mk III \t使\t用\t帕\t卡\t德\t“\t灰\t背\t隼\t”\t发\t动\t机\t，\t这\t是\t一\t种\t授\t权\t给\t美\t国\t制\t造\t的\t发\t动\t机\t。\tB Mk I \t和\t B Mk III \t内\t部\t的\t差\t别\t很\t小\t，\t两\t种\t型\t号\t的\t技\t术\t细\t节\t和\t武\t装\t都\t很\t接\t近\t。\t外\t观\t上\t的\t区\t别\t也\t仅\t限\t于\t BIII \t的\t投\t弹\t手\t气\t泡\t窗\t更\t大\t而\t已\t，\t但\t编\t号\t上\t的\t变\t化\t还\t是\t必\t要\t的\t，\t毕\t竟\t不\t同\t的\t发\t动\t机\t有\t不\t同\t的\t后\t勤\t要\t求\t。\t

\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\t于\t 1942 \t年\t 3 \t月\t在\t第\t 44 \t中\t队\t投\t入\t实\t战\t。\t它\t随\t后\t很\t快\t成\t为\t了\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t轰\t炸\t机\t指\t挥\t部\t用\t以\t攻\t击\t德\t国\t心\t脏\t地\t带\t的\t中\t流\t砥\t柱\t，\t不\t仅\t如\t此\t，\t它\t还\t被\t用\t来\t攻\t击\t全\t欧\t洲\t的\t敌\t方\t目\t标\t。\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\t主\t要\t的\t行\t动\t都\t在\t夜\t间\t展\t开\t，\t这\t是\t因\t为\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t轰\t炸\t机\t指\t挥\t部\t负\t责\t夜\t间\t轰\t炸\t，\t美\t国\t陆\t军\t航\t空\t军\t则\t负\t责\t日\t间\t轰\t炸\t。\t

\t在\t防\t御\t火\t力\t上\t，\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\t有\t八\t挺.303 \t口\t径\t柯\t尔\t特\t-\t勃\t朗\t宁\t Mk II \t机\t枪\t，\t分\t别\t安\t置\t在\t三\t个\t炮\t塔\t中\t：\t两\t挺\t在\t机\t鼻\t炮\t塔\t，\t两\t挺\t在\t机\t背\t炮\t塔\t，\t剩\t下\t四\t挺\t则\t在\t机\t尾\t炮\t塔\t。\t“\t兰\t开\t斯\t特\t”\t的\t最\t大\t载\t弹\t量\t在\t二\t战\t期\t间\t高\t居\t榜\t首\t：\t 14
column2: 000 \t磅\t（\t约\t合\t 6

column8: 000 \t磅\t（\t约\t合\t 9
