column1: The Netherlands became another European customer of the Curtiss Hawk 75 fighters. The Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 fighters of the Dutch order were powered by the same engine as the Hawk 75A-5: the 9-cylinder single-row air-cooled Wright GR-1820-G205A Cyclone with a maximum output of 1
However
column2: the aircraft possessed more powerful weaponry than the prototype. The Hawk 75A-7 was armed with one large-caliber 12.7 mm synchronized Colt-Browning ANM2.5 machine gun in the fuselage with 200 rounds
column3: one 7.7 mm synchronized Browning Mk.II .303 machine gun in the fuselage with 600 rounds and two 7.7 mm Browning Mk.II .303 machine guns mounted on the wing panels with 500 rounds each. Bomb racks were mounted on the underside wing panels.

column1: The Dutch ordered 24 Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 fighters in total
column2: but the Curtiss company was unable to fulfill the order before the Germans occupied the Netherlands in May 1940.

column1: After the German forces' lightning-fast invasion of the country
column2: the planes were sent directly from the USA to the Far East
column3: where they joined the Military Aviation of the Royal Netherlands East Indies Army (Militaire Luchtvaart van het Koninklijk Nederlands-Indisch Leger
column4: ML-KNIL) in the Dutch East Indies (now Indonesia). In March 1941
column5: the Curtiss Hawk 75A-7s arrived on the island of Java and went into service in the 1st and 2nd aviation units (Vliegtuigafdeling).

column1: By the time the Japanese invaded the Dutch East Indies
column2: 16 of the aircraft were still in service. The remaining Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 had been written off due to engine breakdowns.

column1: The Dutch Hawk 75A-7s went into battle against Japanese aircraft
column2: but being outnumbered and of a lower quality than the Japanese Mitsubishi A6M Zero
column3: they were not particularly successful. On 21 December 1941
column4: out of four Hawk 75A-7s sent to attack Japanese military facilities
column5: only one returned. In January 1942
column6: five more of the planes were lost. On 3 February
column7: four Hawk 75A-7s intercepted Japanese bombers flying with an A6M fighter escort to the city of Surabaya. The Dutch were able to shoot down a twin-engine Mitsubishi G3M bomber
column8: but the fighter escort also shot down three Curtiss Hawks.

column1: The remaining Dutch Hawk 75A-7s were destroyed in an attack on the airfield they were based at on 5 February 1942.";"La descripción estará lista pronto.";"Ещё одним европейским заказчиком истребителей Curtiss Hawk 75 стали Нидерланды. Однако вооружение самолёта отличалось от прототипа

column1: Holendrzy zamówili w sumie 24 myśliwce Curtiss Hawk 75A-7
column2: jednak firma Curtiss nie zdołała zrealizować zamówienia w całości przed niemiecką okupacją Holandii w maju 1940 r.

column1: Po przeprowadzonej w błyskawicznym tempie niemieckiej inwazji

column3: gdzie zostały wcielone do Lotnictwa Wojskowego Królewskiej Armii Holenderskich Indii Wschodnich (Militaire Luchtvaart van het Koninklijk Nederlands-Indisch Leger

column5: czyli ówczesnej kolonii holenderskiej

column1: 16 z tych maszyn było nadal w czynnej służbie podczas japońskiej inwazji na Holenderskie Indie Wschodnie. Były one jednak spisane na straty z powodu awarii silników.
Holenderskie Hawki 75A-7 podejmowały walkę z samolotami japońskimi
column2: jednak nie były zbyt skuteczne. Przyczyną tego była przewaga liczebna i technologiczna wrogich Mitsubishi A6M Zero. 21 grudnia 1941 r. powrócił tylko jeden z czterech Curtiss Hawków 75A-7
column3: wysłanych do ataku na japońskie obiekty wojskowe. W styczniu 1942 r. stracono kolejnych pięć samolotów. 3 lutego cztery Hawki 75A-7 zaatakowały japońskie bombowce
column4: eskortowane przez jeden myśliwiec A6M

column1: Holanďané objednali celkem 24 strojů

V lednu 1942 bylo ztraceno dalších pět letadel. 3. Února čtyři Hawky 75A-7 zachytily japonské bombardéry se stíhacím doprovodem A6M mířícími na město Surabaja. column1: しかし、\t航空機には\t試作機よりも\t優れた\t武器が\t搭載されました。\tホーク\t75A-7\tの\t機体には、\t200弾装備した\t大口径の\t12.7 mm\tコルトブローニング\tANM2.5機関銃が\t1挺、\t600弾装備した\t7.7 mm\tブローニング\tMk.II.303機関銃が\t1挺、\tそれぞれ\t500弾装備した\tブローニング\tMk.II .303機関銃が\t翼\tパネルに\t2挺搭載されていました。\t爆弾架は\t翼\tパネルの\t下部に\t備えてありました。\t

column1: Апошнія галандскія Hawk 75A-7 былі знішчаныя пры налёце на аэрадром іх базіравання 5 лютага 1942 г.";"The Netherlands became another European customer of the Curtiss Hawk 75 fighters. The Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 fighters of the Dutch order were powered by the same engine as the Hawk 75A-5: the 9-cylinder single-row air-cooled Wright GR-1820-G205A Cyclone with a maximum output of 1
However
column2: the aircraft possessed more powerful weaponry than the prototype. The Hawk 75A-7 was armed with one large-caliber 12.7 mm synchronized Colt-Browning ANM2.5 machine gun in the fuselage with 200 rounds
column3: one 7.7 mm synchronized Browning Mk.II .303 machine gun in the fuselage with 600 rounds and two 7.7 mm Browning Mk.II .303 machine guns mounted on the wing panels with 500 rounds each. Bomb racks were mounted on the underside wing panels.

column1: The Dutch ordered 24 Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 fighters in total
column2: but the Curtiss company was unable to fulfill the order before the Germans occupied the Netherlands in May 1940.

column1: After the German forces' lightning-fast invasion of the country
column2: the planes were sent directly from the USA to the Far East
column3: where they joined the Military Aviation of the Royal Netherlands East Indies Army (Militaire Luchtvaart van het Koninklijk Nederlands-Indisch Leger
column4: ML-KNIL) in the Dutch East Indies (now Indonesia). In March 1941
column5: the Curtiss Hawk 75A-7s arrived on the island of Java and went into service in the 1st and 2nd aviation units (Vliegtuigafdeling).

column1: By the time the Japanese invaded the Dutch East Indies
column2: 16 of the aircraft were still in service. The remaining Curtiss Hawk 75A-7 had been written off due to engine breakdowns.

column1: The Dutch Hawk 75A-7s went into battle against Japanese aircraft
column2: but being outnumbered and of a lower quality than the Japanese Mitsubishi A6M Zero
column3: they were not particularly successful. On 21 December 1941
column4: out of four Hawk 75A-7s sent to attack Japanese military facilities
column5: only one returned. In January 1942
column6: five more of the planes were lost. On 3 February
column7: four Hawk 75A-7s intercepted Japanese bombers flying with an A6M fighter escort to the city of Surabaya. The Dutch were able to shoot down a twin-engine Mitsubishi G3M bomber
column8: but the fighter escort also shot down three Curtiss Hawks.

encyclopedia/vampire_fb5/desc;"The de Havilland DH.100 Vampire was a single engine jet fighter which entered service with the RAF in 1946. Designed to Air Ministry specification F.6/41
column2: the demand was for a fighter with a maximum speed in excess of 500 mph and a combat radius of at least 300 miles. The twin tail boom layout design allowed a short tailpipe from the powerplant
column3: a de Havilland Goblin centrifugal turbojet. This limited the loss of thrust and reduced overall weight. Also of note in the design was the use of plywood and balsa wood in the construction of the cockpit section; de Havilland already had experience of using wood in the construction of high performance aircraft.

column1: Preliminary flight testing in September 1943 proved to be a success
column2: with modifications made to the rudder to reduce drag and increase stability. The third prototype aircraft was also fitted with the planned standard armament of four 20mm Hispano cannon. In May 1944 an order for 120 aircraft was placed
column3: and the first production Vampire F.Mk.I made its maiden flight in April 1945; the Vampire briefly held the record as the fastest British jet fighter with a top speed of 540 mph. No.247 Squadron was the first unit to be equipped with the Vampire in March 1946
column4: shortly followed by No.54 and No.72 Squadrons to form the first Vampire Wing at RAF Chilbolton. In 1948 Vampires were employed by the 2nd Tactical Air Force based in Germany. A specially modified Vampire again hit the record books when it achieved a world altitude record of 59
column5: 446 feet.

column1: 1948 also saw the first testing of the FB.Mk.5. This was initially a modified Vampire F.3 with a strengthened and clipped wing
column2: increased armor and greater ground clearance for the carrying of external ordnance. This fighter-bomber variant of the Vampire was capable of carrying up to 2000 lbs of bombs or 60 lb rockets
column3: and went on to equip 40 squadrons within the RAF as well as being the first RAF jets to operate in the Far East. The Vampire FB.Mk.5 was used operationally in ground attack missions against insurgents in Malaya until it was replaced by the Venom in 1953. The FB.Mk.5 was also used as the basis for the Royal Navy’s Sea Vampire F.Mk.20 which
column4: fitted with an arrestor hook
column5: long travel landing gear and larger wing flaps
column6: entered service with the Fleet Air Arm in June 1949. A popular export fighter
column7: just under 3300 Vampires were built - many under license overseas.";"Description à venir.";"Il de Havilland DH.100 Vampire era un caccia a reazione monomotore che entrò in servizio nella RAF nel 1946. Progettato secondo la specifica F.6/41 del Ministero dell'Aeronautica
column8: la richiesta era di un caccia capace di superare le 500 miglia orarie e con una autonomia di almeno 300 miglia. La progettazione a doppia deriva permise una corta struttura tubolare dall'impianto del motore
column9: un turbojet a centrifuga de Havilland Goblin. Ciò limitava le perdite di spinta e permetteva una riduzione del peso dell'aereo. Va rilevata l'inclusione
column10: nel progetto
column11: dell'uso di compensato e legno di balsa nella costruzione della cabina; la de Havilland aveva già esperienza nell'impiego di legno in aerei di alte prestazioni.

column9: molti dei quali prodotti oltremare su licenza.";"Dieser Eintrag wird in Kürze verfügbar sein.";"El de Havilland DH.100 Vampire fue un caza jet monomotor que entro en servicio con la RAF en 1946.Diseñado con la especificación del Ministerio del Aire F.6/41
column10: la demanda era por un caza con una velocidad máxima en exceso de 804 km/h y un radio de combate de por lo menos 482 kilómetros. El diseño de cola doble permitía colocar un tubo de escape corto del motor

Otra característica del diseño era el uso de madera contrachapada y de balsa en la construcción de la sección de cabina;de Havilland ya tenia experiencia en el uso de madera contrachapada para la construcción de aeronaves de alto rendimiento.Vuelos de prueba preliminares en Septiembre de 1943

column14: y el Vampire F.Mk.I de primera producción hizo su vuelo inaugural en Abril de 1945; el Vampire obtuvo el celebrado récord de ser el avión jet Británico mas rápido con una velocidad máxima de 869 km/h .El escuadrón n°247 fue la primera unidad que fue equipada con el Vampire en Marzo de 1946

column5: algo menos de 3.300 vampiros fueron construidos - muchos bajo licencia en el extranjero.";"De Havilland DH.100 Vampire был одномоторным реактивным истребителем
column6: который поступил на вооружение ВВС Британии в 1946 году. В соответствии с техническим заданием Министерства авиации № F.6/41
column7: требовался истребитель с максимальной скоростью свыше 500 миль/ч (805 км/ч) и боевым радиусом действия как минимум 300 миль (483 км). Двухбалочная схема хвостовой части фюзеляжа позволила разместить там короткую выходную трубу силовой установки - турбореактивного двигателя de Havilland Goblin. Это ограничило снижение тяги и уменьшило общий вес самолёта. Заметной особенностью конструкции также было использование клеёной фанеры и бальзового дерева при изготовлении кабины пилота; у de Havilland уже был опыт использования дерева в изготовлении высокоманёвренных самолётов.

column1: Предварительные лётные испытания в сентябре 1943 года оказались успешными

column3: снизившим торможение и увеличившим стабильность. Третий самолёт-прототип был также оснащён запланированным стандартным вооружением
column4: состоящим из четырёх 20-мм пушек Hispano. В мае 1944 года был размещён первый заказ на 120 самолётов
column5: а первая партия Vampire F.Mk.I осуществила свой первый полёт в апреле 1945 года; Vampire быстро побил рекорд как самый быстрый британский реактивный истребитель
column6: с максимальной скоростью 540 миль/ч (869 км/ч). Эскадрилья № 247 была первым подразделением
column7: вооружённым Vampire в марте 1946 года
column8: а вскоре к ней присоединились эскадрильи №№ 54 и 72
column9: сформировав первый отряд Vampire на британском аэродроме Чилболтон. В 1948 году самолёты Vampire взяла на вооружение 2-я Тактическая Воздушная Армия
column10: базировавшаяся в Германии. Специально модифицированный Vampire снова побил мировой рекорд
column11: достигнув высоты в 59.446 футов (18.119 м).

column1: 1948 год также запомнился первыми испытаниями FB.Mk.5. Изначально это был модифицированный Vampire F.3 с укреплённым и фиксированным крылом
column2: усиленной обшивкой и большим земным просветом для подвески наружного вооружения. Данный вариант истребителя-бомбардировщика Vampire мог нести до 2000 фунтов (907 кг) бомбовой нагрузки или 60-фунтовые (27-кг) ракеты
column3: и впоследствии вооружил 40 эскадриль ВВС Великобритании
column4: а также был первым британским реактивным самолётом
column5: использовавшимся на Дальнем Востоке. В боевых условиях Vampire FB.Mk.5 использовался в рамках наземных операций против повстанцев в Малайе
column6: пока его не заменил Venom в 1953 году. FB.Mk.5 также служил основой для самолёта ВМС Великобритании Vampire F.Mk.20
column7: который
column8: оснащённый посадочным крюком
column9: посадочным шасси с большой длиной хода
column10: а также более крупными закрылками
column11: поступил на вооружение морской авиации в июне 1949 года. Самолёт являлся популярным экспортным истребителем
column12: было построено почти 3300 самолётов Vampire – многие из них по лицензии за границей.";"De Havilland DH.100 Vampire był jednosilnikowym myśliwcem odrzutowym wprowadzonym do służby w RAF w 1946 roku. Podstawą jego budowy była opracowana przez Ministerstwo Lotnictwa specyfikacja nr F.6/41. wymagająca
column13: aby nowy samolot posiadał prędkość co najmniej 800 km/godz. Oraz zasięg do 5000 km. Charakterystyczna dwukadłubowa konstrukcja maszyny dała możliwość montażu krótkiej dyszy silnika połączonej bezpośrednio z jednostką napędową. Było to nowatorskie rozwiązanie zastosowane w napędach odrzutowych typu Havilland Goblin
column14: dzięki któremu zmniejszono ich masę całkowitą oraz obniżono straty ciągu. Nowością było również użycie wytrzymałej sklejki drewnianej do wykonania sekcji kokpitu
column15: w czym de Havilland wyspecjalizował się produkując innego rodzaju samoloty o wysokich osiągach. Wstępne fazy testów prototypów miały miejsce już we wrześniu 1943 roku i zakończyły się sukcesem po tym
column16: jak zmniejszono opory przepływu powietrza na lotkach zwiększając jednocześnie stabilność konstrukcji. Również uzbrojenie „Wampira”
column17: stanowiące cztery działka o kalibrze 20 mm typu Hispano
column18: nie odbiegało od ówczesnych standardów wyposażenia myśliwców. W rezultacie w maju 1944 roku złożono zamówienie na 120 sztuk samolotu DH.100 Mk.1
column19: z których pierwszy model seryjny wykonał dziewiczy lot na miesiąc przed zakończeniem działań zbrojnych w Europie. Jego prędkość maksymalna wynosiła 865 km/godz.
column20: co stanowiło rekord pośród wszystkich dotychczasowo wyprodukowanych brytyjskich maszyn. W nowy nabytek jako pierwsza została uzbrojona 247 eskadra RAF
column21: która wraz z eskadrami 54 i 72 tworzyły pełną formację samolotów odrzutowych stacjonujących w bazie Chilbolton na południu Anglii. Dwa lata później szwadron ten wsparł Drugą Jednostkę Taktycznych Sił Powietrznych skierowaną do patrolowania nieba w Niemczech Zachodnich. Z czasem pierwotna wersja myśliwca de Havilland DH.100 Mk.1 została poddana wielu zmianom konstrukcyjnym
column22: które zwiększyły jego możliwości bojowe oraz wielkość opancerzenia. Doczekał się on również modyfikacji przystosowujących go do walki strategicznej. Wersja bombowca  była wstanie zabrać ze sobą ładunek o wadze do 900 kg wraz z rakietami o wadze do 30 kg. Potencjał ten był wykorzystywany w 40 różnych eskadrach RAF operujących w Europie
column23: na Bliskim Wschodzie jak i innych regionach Świata. W 1949 roku do użytku wszedł model specjalnie przystosowany do operowania na lotniskowcach Royal Navy. Na jego wyposażeniu znalazł się niezbędny w tym wypadku hak
column24: zmodyfikowane podwozie oraz powiększone klapy.  W swoim czasie brytyjski „Wampir” stanowił jeden z najpopularniejszych myśliwców przeznaczonych na eksport
column25: a jego produkcja osiągnęła 3300 egzemplarzy wliczając w to również wersje powstałe na licencjach zagranicznych. Ostatecznie De Havilland DH.100 Vampire został zastąpiony w 1953 roku przez kolejny
column26: bardziej nowatorski produkt tej firmy o groźnie brzmiącej nazwie Venom.";"De Havilland D.H.100 Vampire byl jednomotorový proudový stíhací letoun zavedený do služby v RAF v roce 1946. Specifikace ministersva letectví F.6/41 požadovala stíhací letoun s maximální rychlostí přesahující 500 mph (800 km/h) a akční rádius nejméně 300 mil (480 km). Dvojitý nosník ocasních ploch umožnil použití krátké trysky odstředivého proudového motoru de Havilland Goblin. To omezilo ztráty tahu a snížilo celkovou hmotnost. V návrhu byla použita i překližka a balsové dřevo v konstrukci kokpitu; de Havilland měl už zkušenosti s použitím dřeva v konstrukci vysoce výkonných letounů.

column1: Předběžné letové zkoušky v září 1943 byly úspěšné
column2: vyžadovaly jen úpravy směrovky ke snížení odporu a zvýšení stability. Třetí prototyp letounu byl vybaven plánovanou standardní výzbrojí skládající se ze čtyř 20mm kanónů. V květnu 1944 bylo objednáno 120 letadel a první vyrobený Vampire F Mk.I poprvé vzlétl v dubnu 1945. Vampire krátce držel rekord nejrychlejší britské stíhačky s nejvyšší rychlostí 540 mph (860 km/h).

column1: Provní jednoutkou vybavenou letouny Vampire se v březnu 1946 stala 247. peruť
column2: po níž brzy následovaly 54. a 72. peruť z prvního křídla Vampirů v RAF
column3: umísteného v Chilboltonu. V roce 1948 byla Vampiry vybavena 2. taktická armáda umístěná v Německu. Speciálně upravený Vampire dosáhl dalšího světového rekordu
column4: když dosáhl nadmořské výšky 59 446 stop (18 131 metrů).

column1: V roce 1948 byl také poprvé testován FB Mk.5. Šlo o upravený Vampire F Mk.3 se zesílenými a zkrácenými křídly
column2: silnějším pancéřováním a vyšší světlou výškou pro výzbroj na vnějších podvěsech. Tato stíhací a bombardovací varianta Vampiru mohla nést až 2000 lb (910 kg) pum nebo 60 lb rakety
column3: a bylo jím vybaveno čtyřicet perutí RAF. Také šlo o první proudový stíhač RAF operující na Dálném východě.

column1: Vampire FB Mk.5 byl nasazován na pozemní útoky proti povstalcům v Malajsii
column2: dokud nebyl v roce 1953 nahrazen letounem Venom. FB Mk.5 byl také použit jako základ pro verzi Sea Vampire F Mk.20 vyrobenou pro královské námořnictvo
column3: která byla vybavena přistávacím hákem
column4: dlouhými podvozkovými nohami a většími klapkami. Do služby byla uvedena v červnu 1949. Celkem bylo vyrobeno necelých 3300 těchto oblíbených stíhaček
column5: mnoho z nich v licenci.";"Metin yakında hazır olacak.";"德\t哈\t维\t兰\t DH.100\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t喷\t气\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t于\t 1946 \t年\t开\t始\t在\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t服\t役\t。\t根\t据\t空\t军\t F.6/41 \t号\t设\t计\t招\t标\t，\t战\t机\t需\t超\t过\t 500 \t英\t里\t/\t小\t时\t，\t作\t战\t半\t径\t不\t得\t低\t于\t 300 \t英\t里\t。\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t毫\t无\t疑\t问\t达\t到\t了\t该\t要\t求\t。\t双\t垂\t尾\t结\t构\t能\t缩\t短\t尾\t部\t排\t气\t管\t到\t德\t哈\t维\t兰\t自\t制\t的\t“\t地\t精\t”\t离\t心\t涡\t轮\t喷\t气\t发\t动\t机\t的\t长\t度\t，\t从\t而\t有\t效\t控\t制\t推\t力\t流\t失\t，\t减\t少\t总\t重\t量\t。\t另\t外\t，\t飞\t机\t还\t采\t用\t了\t轻\t木\t和\t三\t合\t板\t制\t造\t的\t座\t舱\t组\t件\t—\t—\t德\t哈\t维\t兰\t显\t然\t在\t使\t用\t木\t材\t制\t造\t高\t性\t能\t飞\t机\t方\t面\t已\t积\t累\t了\t不\t少\t的\t经\t验\t。\t

column1: 1943 \t年\t 9 \t月\t开\t始\t的\t初\t步\t试\t飞\t工\t作\t很\t成\t功\t。\t德\t哈\t维\t兰\t在\t此\t期\t间\t改\t进\t了\t飞\t机\t的\t方\t向\t舵\t，\t在\t减\t少\t阻\t力\t的\t同\t时\t提\t高\t了\t稳\t定\t性\t。\t第\t三\t架\t原\t型\t机\t还\t装\t上\t了\t计\t划\t中\t的\t标\t准\t武\t装\t：\t四\t门\t 20 \t毫\t米\t西\t斯\t帕\t诺\t机\t炮\t。\t1944 \t年\t 5 \t月\t，\t空\t军\t下\t达\t了\t一\t份\t 120 \t架\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t的\t订\t单\t。\t1945 \t年\t 4 \t月\t，\t第\t一\t架\t量\t产\t型\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\tF Mk I \t完\t成\t了\t首\t飞\t，\t并\t以\t 540 \t英\t里\t/\t小\t时\t夺\t得\t了\t英\t国\t最\t快\t喷\t气\t战\t斗\t机\t的\t桂\t冠\t。\t1946 \t年\t 3 \t月\t，\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t第\t 247 \t中\t队\t成\t为\t第\t一\t支\t装\t备\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t的\t部\t队\t，\t第\t 54 \t和\t第\t 72 \t中\t队\t则\t紧\t随\t其\t后\t。\t而\t这\t三\t个\t中\t队\t组\t成\t了\t第\t一\t个\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t大\t队\t，\t驻\t扎\t在\t邱\t博\t尔\t顿\t基\t地\t。\t1948 \t年\t时\t，\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t还\t装\t备\t给\t了\t驻\t扎\t在\t德\t国\t的\t第\t二\t战\t术\t航\t空\t队\t。\t值\t得\t一\t提\t的\t是\t，\t一\t架\t特\t殊\t改\t型\t的\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t还\t创\t造\t了\t当\t时\t的\t升\t限\t世\t界\t纪\t录\t：\t59

column1: 1948 \t年\t，\t第\t一\t架\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\tFB.5 \t进\t行\t了\t首\t飞\t测\t试\t。\t该\t机\t改\t自\t一\t架\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\tF.3\t，\t经\t过\t增\t强\t结\t构\t、\t裁\t短\t机\t翼\t、\t增\t强\t装\t甲\t和\t增\t加\t离\t地\t高\t度\t后\t，\t能\t顺\t利\t携\t带\t外\t挂\t武\t装\t。\t这\t种\t战\t斗\t轰\t炸\t机\t改\t型\t最\t多\t能\t携\t带\t 2
column2: 000 \t磅\t重\t量\t的\t炸\t弹\t或\t 60 \t磅\t火\t箭\t弹\t。\t随\t后\t，\t该\t机\t型\t配\t发\t到\t了\t 40 \t个\t中\t队\t，\t并\t成\t为\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t第\t一\t种\t在\t远\t东\t地\t区\t投\t入\t实\t战\t的\t喷\t气\t机\t。\t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\tFB.5 \t曾\t在\t马\t来\t西\t亚\t针\t对\t叛\t乱\t分\t子\t执\t行\t了\t大\t量\t对\t地\t攻\t击\t任\t务\t，\t直\t到\t“\t毒\t液\t”\t型\t战\t机\t于\t 1953 \t年\t接\t过\t其\t衣\t钵\t。\t皇\t家\t海\t军\t“\t海\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\tF.20 \t也\t脱\t胎\t于\t FB.5\t，\t只\t是\t加\t装\t了\t着\t舰\t钩\t、\t长\t杆\t起\t落\t架\t和\t更\t大\t的\t襟\t翼\t，\t并\t于\t 1949 \t年\t 6 \t月\t起\t配\t属\t海\t军\t航\t空\t团\t。\t

column1: \t“\t吸\t血\t鬼\t”\t还\t是\t一\t款\t畅\t销\t的\t出\t口\t型\t战\t机\t。\t在\t近\t 3
column2: 300 \t架\t的\t总\t产\t量\t中\t，\t有\t相\t当\t一\t部\t分\t都\t是\t在\t海\t外\t授\t权\t生\t产\t的\t。";"デ・ハビランド\tDH.100\tバンパイアは\t単発\tエンジンの\tジェット\t戦闘機で、\t1946年に\tイギリス\t空軍に\t配備された。\t航空省に\tF.6/41\tとして\t設計され、\t要求されたのは\t最高速度が\t500mphを\t超え、\t戦闘行動半径が\t少なくとも\t300milesの\t戦闘機であった。\t双\tブーム\t形式尾部の\t設計は、\tデ・ハビランドゴブリン\t遠心式\tターボジェット、\t動力装置からの\t排気管を\t短くすることができた。\tまた、\t推力の\t喪失を\t制限し\t総重量を\t減らすこともできた。\t設計の\t他の\t注目点としては、\tコックピット\t部分の\t建造に\tベニヤ\t板や\tバルサ\t材を\t使ったことである。\tデ・ハビランドはこれまでにも、\t高性能航空機の\t建造に\t木材を\t使った\t経験があった。\t

column1: 1943年\t9月の\t先行飛行\tテストで\t成功を\t収め、\t抵抗を\t減らし\t安定性を\t上げるように\t方向舵に\t調整が\t加えられた。\t3番目の\tプロトタイプは、\t計画通りの\t標準武装である\t4門の\t20mm\tイスパノ\t機関砲を\t装備した。\t1944年\t5月に\t120機の\t航空機の\t注文がされ、\tバンパイア\tF.Mk.Ⅰの\t最初の\t生産機が\t1945年\t4月に\t初飛行を\t実施した。\tバンパイアは、\tイギリス\t軍\tジェット\t戦闘機としての\t最高速度\t540mphをあっさりと\t記録した。\t第\t247飛行中隊が、\t1946年\t3月に\t初めて\tバンパイアを\t配備した\tユニットとなり、\tその\t後まもなく\t第\t54\tと\t第\t72飛行中隊が\tイギリス\t空軍\tチルボルトン\t基地で\t初となる\tバンパイア\t航空団を\t形成した。\t1948年に\tバンパイアは、\tドイツの\t第\t2戦術空軍に\t配備された。\tそこで\t再び、\t特別に\t調整された\tバンパイアが\t5万\t9446feetの\t世界最高高度記録を\t達成した。\tまた、\t1948年には\t初となる\tFB.Mk.5\tの\tテストも\t行われた。\tこの\t機は\t当初、\t翼を\t強化してさらに\t短くし、\t装甲を\t強化して、\t外面に\t機関砲を\t取り\t付け\t対地攻撃を\t強化した\tバンパイア\tF.3\tの\t改良型であった。\tこの\tバンパイアの\t戦闘爆撃機型は、\t最大\t2000lbsまでの\t爆弾あるいは\t60lb\tロケット\t弾を\t搭載することができ、\tイギリス\t空軍で\t40\tの\t飛行中隊に\t配備され、\t極東で\t運用された\t初の\tイギリス\t空軍\tジェットともなった。\tバンパイア\tFB.Mk.5\tは\tマラヤの\t反乱軍に\t対しての\t対地攻撃に\t運用されたが、\t1953年に\tベノムに\t取って\t代わられた。\tFB.Mk.5\tは\tイギリス\t海軍の\tシーバンパイア\tF.Mk.20\tの\t基盤にも\t使われた。\tシーバンパイアは\tアレスターフック、\t長距離飛行着陸装置、\t大きくなった\t下げ\t翼が\t取り\t付けられ、\t1949年\t6月に\t艦隊航空隊に\t配備された。\t人気のある\t輸出戦闘機であり、\t3300機弱の\tバンパイアが\t製造され、\tライセンスに\t基づき\t海外で\t大量に\t改良製造された。";"O de Havilland DH.100 Vampire foi um caça a jato ao qual entrou em serviço na RAF em 1946. Desenhado como especificação F.6/41 pelo Ministério do Ar
column2: a exigência era por um caça com uma velocidade máxima de 500 mph e um raio de combate de 300 milhas. O desenho da cauda dupla e crescida permitiu a instalação de um pequeno tubo de escape do motor
column3: um turbojato centrifugo de Havilland Goblin. Isto limitou a perda de impulso e uma massa total reduzida. É também de notar que foi usada madeira compensada e de balsa na construção da secção do cockpit; de Havilland já tinha experiência no uso de madeira na construção de aviões de alta performance.

column1: Testes de voo preliminares em setembro de 1943 provaram ser um sucesso
column2: com modificações feitas no leme para reduzir atrito e aumentar a estabilidade. o terceiro prototipo foi equipado com o planeado armamento predefinido
column3: quatro canhões de 20 mm Hispano. Em maio de 1944
column4: foi feita uma encomenda de 120 aviões
column5: e a primeira produção do Vampire F.Mk.I fez o batismo de voo em abril de 1945; o Vampire deteve por pouco tempo o recorde do mais rapido avião a jato da RAF
column6: com uma velocidade máxima de 540 mph. O Esquadrão Nº247 foi a primeira unidade a ser equipada com os Vampire em março de 1946
column7: seguido muito rapidamente pelos Nº54 e Nº72 perfazendo a primeira asa na RAF em Chilbolton. Em 1948 os Vampire foram empregues pela 2ª Força Aérea Tática na Alemanha. Um Vampire especialmente modificado marcou os livros de recordes ao conseguir a altitude de 59446 pés.

column1: 1948 também viu o primeiro teste do FB.Mk.5. Este foi inicialmente uma modificação do Vampire F.3 com uma asa cortada reforçada
column2: aumentando a armadura e a distância ao solo para carregar equipamento externo. Esta variante caça bombardeiro era capaz de carregar até 2000 libras de bombas ou rockets de 60 libras
column3: e iria equipar 40 esquadrões na RAF assim como os primeiros jatos da RAF a operar no Médio Oriente. O Vampire FB.Mk.5 foi usado em ataque ao solo em missões contra insurgentes na Malásia até ser substituído pelo Venom em 1953. O FB.Mk.5 foi também usado como base para o Sea Vampire F.Mk.20 da Royal Navy ao qual

column7: just under 3300 Vampires were built - many under license overseas.";"德哈威蘭DH.100“吸血鬼”是一種單發噴氣戰鬥機，於1946年開始在皇家空軍服役。根據空軍F.6/41號設計招標，

column1: 戰機需超過500英里/時，作戰半徑不得低於300英里。“吸血鬼”毫無疑問達到了該要求。雙垂尾結構能縮
短尾部排氣管到德哈威蘭自製的“地精”離心渦輪噴氣發動機的長度，從而有效控制推力流失，減少總重
量。另外，飛機還採用了輕木和三合板製造的座艙元件——德哈威蘭顯然在使用木材製造高性能飛機方面
已積累了不少的經驗。
1943年9月開始的初步試飛工作很成功。德哈威蘭在此期間改進了飛機的方向舵，在減少阻力的同時提高
了穩定性。第三架原型機還裝上了計畫中的標準武裝：四門20毫米西斯帕諾機炮。1944年5月，空軍下達
了一份120架“吸血鬼”的訂單。1945年4月，第一架量產型“吸血鬼”F Mk I完成了首飛，
並以540英里/時奪得了英國最快噴氣戰鬥機的桂冠。
1946年3月，皇家空軍第247中隊成為第一支裝備“吸血鬼”的部隊，第54和第72中隊則緊隨其後。而這
三個中隊組成了第一個“吸血鬼”大隊，駐紮在邱博爾頓基地。1948年時，“吸血鬼”還裝備給了駐紮
在德國的第二戰術航空隊。值得一提的是，一架特殊改型的“吸血鬼”還創造了當時的升限世界紀錄：
1948年，第一架“吸血鬼”FB.5進行了首飛測試。該機改自一架“吸血鬼”F.3，經過增強結構、裁短
機翼、增強裝甲和增加離地高度後，能順利攜帶外掛武裝。這種戰鬥轟炸機改型最多能攜帶2000磅重量
的炸彈或60磅火箭彈。隨後，該機型配發到了40個中隊，並成為皇家空軍第一種在遠東地區投入實戰的
噴氣機。“吸血鬼”FB.5曾在馬來西亞針對叛亂分子執行了大量對地攻擊任務，直到“毒液”型戰機於
1953年接過其衣缽。皇家海軍“海吸血鬼”F.20也脫胎於FB.5，只是加裝了著艦鉤、長桿起落架和更大
的襟翼，並於1949年6月起配屬海軍航空團。
“吸血鬼”還是一款暢銷的出口型戰機。在近3300架的總產量中，有相當一部分都是在海外授權生產的。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

encyclopedia/tempest_mk2/desc;"The Hawker Tempest Mk.II was a single seat fighter powered by a single Bristol Centaurus radial engine. After the Hawker Typhoon had proved unsatisfactory in its originally intended role as an interceptor
column2: Hawker continued their work on viable options for a replacement aircraft. The Hawker Tornado project had been run with two separate engine options concurrently; after the Tornado was cancelled the idea of trialing two separate engines was applied to Hawker’s new venture
column3: then entitled the Typhoon II. After major design changes and with a perceived lack of confidence in the Typhoon name
column4: the aircraft was designated the Tempest. The original prototypes were planned as the Tempest I with the Sabre IV engine and the Tempest V with the Sabre II. Shortly after this
column5: two Tempest Mk.IIs were ordered with the 18 cylinder Bristol Centaurus engine
column6: rated at 2520 hp. An order for 500 Tempest IIs was placed in October 1942
column7: before the prototype had even first taken to the air. The first flight occurred in June 1943 before the Bristol Aeroplane Company began production
column8: completing construction of its first example in October 1944
column9: joining the two prototypes to continue trials. After delays in the Tempest II program the aircraft type was originally intended for use against the Japanese in the Far East but entered service just too late for the operations in the Second World War. The first two Tempest II squadrons were No.54 and No.247 in autumn 1945. Only two squadrons of Tempest IIs operated from the UK mainland itself. With the war’s end the demand for high numbers of Hawker’s new fighter no longer remained and aircraft contracts were reduced significantly. Whilst ‘Tiger Force’ – the planned force for the Far East – had been cancelled
column10: the RAF still opted to deploy 180 Tempest IIs to the Far East between 1946 and 1947. Four squadrons were stood up in India and used in policing actions in the local area before the aircraft were handed over to the Royal Indian Air Force. The Tempest II was also used as part of the British Forces of Occupation in Germany until July 1949. Only 552 Tempest IIs were built
column11: serving with the RAF
column12: India and Pakistan.";"Description à venir.";"L'Hawker Tempest Mk. II era un caccia monoposto alimentato da un motore radiale Bristol Centaurus. Dopo che l'Hawker Typhoon si fosse rivelato insoddisfacente nel suo ruolo originale di intercettatore

column42: el tipo de aeronave fue originalmente destinado para usarse en contra de los Japoneses en el Lejano Oriente pero entro demasiado tarde para las operaciones en la Segunda Guerra Mundial. Los primeros dos escuadrones de Tempest II fueron el no.54 y el no.247 en otoño de 1945. Solo dos escuadrones de Tempest II operaron desde el territorio continental Britanico. Con el fin de la guerra la demanda de grandes números del nuevo caza de Hawker no continuo y los contratos de aeronaves se redujeron considerablemente. Mientras que  la ""Tiger Force"" – la fuerza planeada para el Lejano Oriente fuera cancelada

column1: Projekt Hawker Tornado byl rozběhnut současně se dvěma verzemi motoru. Po velkých změnách návrhu a nedostatku důvěry v letouny Typhoon byl název letounu změněn na Tempest. Původní prototypy byly plánovány jako Tempest I s motorem Sabre IV a Tempest V. s motorem Sabre II. Krátce poté byly objednány dva letouny Tempest Mk.II s osmnáctiválcovými motory Bristol Centaurus o výkonu 2520 hp. Dříve než vůbec vzlétl první prototyp

column1: \t由\t于\t霍\t克\t“\t台\t风\t”\t的\t实\t战\t表\t现\t不\t足\t以\t胜\t任\t截\t击\t机\t的\t设\t计\t定\t位\t，\t霍\t克\t公\t司\t不\t得\t不\t继\t续\t研\t发\t替\t代\t型\t号\t。\t霍\t克\t“\t旋\t风\t”\t是\t当\t初\t取\t消\t的\t另\t一\t种\t设\t计\t，\t原\t计\t划\t用\t一\t种\t机\t体\t兼\t容\t两\t种\t发\t动\t机\t。\t而\t霍\t克\t公\t司\t在\t设\t计\t新\t机\t型\t时\t则\t秉\t承\t了\t这\t一\t思\t想\t，\t并\t冠\t之\t以\t“\t台\t风\t”\tII \t的\t名\t号\t。\t不\t过\t，\t该\t机\t后\t来\t修\t改\t了\t许\t多\t主\t要\t设\t计\t，\t且\t“\t台\t风\t”\t这\t个\t字\t眼\t已\t败\t了\t名\t声\t，\t故\t干\t脆\t取\t了\t个\t新\t名\t字\t—\t—\t“\t暴\t风\t”\t。\t

\t计\t划\t中\t的\t原\t型\t机\t有\t两\t架\t：\t使\t用\t“\t军\t刀\t”\tIV \t发\t动\t机\t的\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk I\t，\t和\t使\t用\t“\t军\t刀\t”\tII \t的\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk V\t。\t不\t久\t之\t后\t，\t又\t增\t添\t了\t两\t架\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II\t，\t配\t备\t布\t里\t斯\t托\t“\t半\t人\t马\t座\t”\t18 \t缸\t星\t型\t气\t冷\t发\t动\t机\t，\t标\t称\t功\t率\t 2

column1: \t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II \t原\t本\t打\t算\t用\t于\t远\t东\t战\t场\t的\t对\t日\t作\t战\t，\t但\t由\t于\t计\t划\t推\t迟\t，\t直\t至\t二\t战\t终\t了\t都\t未\t能\t投\t入\t实\t战\t。\t最\t早\t使\t用\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II \t的\t两\t个\t中\t队\t是\t 1945 \t年\t秋\t开\t始\t装\t备\t的\t第\t 54 \t和\t 247 \t中\t队\t，\t至\t于\t英\t国\t本\t土\t则\t只\t部\t署\t了\t两\t个\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II \t中\t队\t。\t战\t争\t结\t束\t后\t，\t鉴\t于\t对\t新\t机\t型\t的\t需\t求\t不\t再\t迫\t切\t，\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II \t的\t订\t单\t骤\t减\t。\t当\t然\t，\t尽\t管\t取\t消\t了\t拟\t派\t往\t远\t东\t作\t战\t的\t“\t虎\t军\t”\t，\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t仍\t旧\t于\t 1946 \t至\t 1947 \t年\t间\t在\t远\t东\t部\t署\t了\t 180 \t架\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II\t。\t印\t度\t则\t成\t立\t了\t四\t个\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II \t中\t队\t执\t行\t本\t地\t警\t戒\t任\t务\t，\t随\t后\t全\t员\t编\t入\t了\t印\t度\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t1949 \t年\t 7 \t月\t之\t前\t，\t驻\t西\t德\t的\t英\t占\t领\t军\t也\t装\t配\t了\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tMk II\t。\t

\t“\t暴\t风\t”\tII \t的\t总\t产\t量\t仅\t为\t 552 \t架\t，\t分\t别\t服\t役\t于\t英\t国\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t、\t印\t度\t空\t军\t和\t巴\t基\t斯\t坦\t空\t军\t。";"ホーカーテンペスト\tMk.IIは\t単発\tブリストルケンタウルス\t星型\tエンジンを\t装備した\t単座戦闘機です。\tホーカータイフーンは\t本来の\t迎撃機としての\t役割を\t果たすには\t能力が\t不十分でしたが、\tホーカー\t社は\t代替機の\t開発を\t継続していました。\tホーカートルネードの\tプロジェクトでは\t2\tつの\t異なる\tエンジンの\t試験が\t同時に\t行われましたが、\tトルネードの\t開発が\t中止となった\t後、\t

異なる\tエンジンを\t搭載するという\t案が\tホーカーに\t適用され、\t「タイフーン\tII」\tと\t名付けられました。\t一部の\t主要設計が\t変更された\t後、\tタイフーンという\t名前は\t信用が\t欠乏していると\t認識されていたため、\t「テンペスト」\tという\t名に\t変更されました。\t当初、\tサブレ\tIV\tエンジンを\t装備した\tテンペスト\tIと、\tサブレ\tII\tエンジンを\t装備した\tテンペスト\tVの\t製造が\t予定されていました。\tその\t直後、\t2機の\tテンペスト\tMk.IIに\t2520馬力出力可能な\t18気筒の\tブリストルセントーラスエンジンを\t搭載するよう\t依頼が\t出されました。\t1942年\t10月、\t試作機の\t試験は\t行われていなかったにもかかわらず、\tテンペスト\tIIは\t500機の\t製造依頼を\t受けました。\tブリストル\t航空機製造会社が\t生産を\t開始する\t前の\t1943年\t6月、\t初飛行が\t行われました。\t1944年\t10月、\t最初の\t試作機の\t製造が\t完了し、\t引き\t続き\t試験を\t行うため\t2機の\t試作機が\t導入されました。\tテンペスト\tIIの\t製造が\t遅延した\t後、\tこの\t航空機は\t元々極東の\t日本に\t対して\t使用するための\t航空機として\t開発されましたが、\t第二次世界大戦での\t運用には\t間に\t合いませんでした。\tテンペスト\tIIを\t使用した\t最初の\t戦隊は\t第\t54及び\t第\t247戦隊で、\t1945年秋から\t運用を\t開始しました。\tイギリス\t本土から\t飛びたった\tテンペスト\tIIを\t運用していた\t戦隊は\t2\tつのみです。\t戦争の\t終結により、\t必要とされていた\t多数の\tホーカーの\t新しい\t戦闘機は\t不要となり、\tこの\t航空機の\t製造は\t大幅に\t縮小されました。\t極東での\t活動が\t目的とされていた「タイガーフォース」\tは\t取り\t消され、\tイギリス\t空軍は\t1946年から\t1947年の\t間に\t極東に\t180機の\tテンペスト\tIIを\t配備することを\t決定しました。\t4\tつの\t戦隊が\tインドへ\t出向し、\t航空機が\tインド\t空軍に\t引き\t渡されるまでの\t間、\t地域の\t警備機として\t使用されていました。\tまた、\tテンペスト\tIIは\t1949年\t7月まで\tフランス\t侵攻で\tドイツ\t軍に\t使用されていました。\t合計で\t552機の\tテンペスト\tIIが\t製造され、\tイギリス\t空軍や\tインド\t空軍、\tパキスタン\t空軍に\t運用されていました。";"O Hawker Tempest Mk.II foi um caça monoplano de um único tripulante munido de um motor radial Bristol Centaurus. column8: Índia e o Paquistão.";"The Hawker Tempest Mk.II was a single seat fighter powered by a single Bristol Centaurus radial engine. After the Hawker Typhoon had proved unsatisfactory in its originally intended role as an interceptor
column9: Hawker continued their work on viable options for a replacement aircraft. The Hawker Tornado project had been run with two separate engine options concurrently; after the Tornado was cancelled the idea of trialing two separate engines was applied to Hawker’s new venture
column10: then entitled the Typhoon II. After major design changes and with a perceived lack of confidence in the Typhoon name
column11: the aircraft was designated the Tempest. The original prototypes were planned as the Tempest I with the Sabre IV engine and the Tempest V with the Sabre II. Shortly after this
column12: two Tempest Mk.IIs were ordered with the 18 cylinder Bristol Centaurus engine
column13: rated at 2520 hp. An order for 500 Tempest IIs was placed in October 1942
column14: before the prototype had even first taken to the air. The first flight occurred in June 1943 before the Bristol Aeroplane Company began production
column15: completing construction of its first example in October 1944
column16: joining the two prototypes to continue trials. After delays in the Tempest II program the aircraft type was originally intended for use against the Japanese in the Far East but entered service just too late for the operations in the Second World War. The first two Tempest II squadrons were No.54 and No.247 in autumn 1945. Only two squadrons of Tempest IIs operated from the UK mainland itself. With the war’s end the demand for high numbers of Hawker’s new fighter no longer remained and aircraft contracts were reduced significantly. Whilst ‘Tiger Force’ – the planned force for the Far East – had been cancelled
column17: the RAF still opted to deploy 180 Tempest IIs to the Far East between 1946 and 1947. Four squadrons were stood up in India and used in policing actions in the local area before the aircraft were handed over to the Royal Indian Air Force. column19: Індыі і Пакістану.";"The Hawker Tempest Mk.II was a single seat fighter powered by a single Bristol Centaurus radial engine. After the Hawker Typhoon had proved unsatisfactory in its originally intended role as an interceptor
column20: Hawker continued their work on viable options for a replacement aircraft. The Hawker Tornado project had been run with two separate engine options concurrently; after the Tornado was cancelled the idea of trialing two separate engines was applied to Hawker’s new venture
column21: then entitled the Typhoon II. After major design changes and with a perceived lack of confidence in the Typhoon name
column22: the aircraft was designated the Tempest. The original prototypes were planned as the Tempest I with the Sabre IV engine and the Tempest V with the Sabre II. Shortly after this
column23: two Tempest Mk.IIs were ordered with the 18 cylinder Bristol Centaurus engine
column24: rated at 2520 hp. An order for 500 Tempest IIs was placed in October 1942
column25: before the prototype had even first taken to the air. The first flight occurred in June 1943 before the Bristol Aeroplane Company began production
column26: completing construction of its first example in October 1944
column27: joining the two prototypes to continue trials. After delays in the Tempest II program the aircraft type was originally intended for use against the Japanese in the Far East but entered service just too late for the operations in the Second World War. The first two Tempest II squadrons were No.54 and No.247 in autumn 1945. Only two squadrons of Tempest IIs operated from the UK mainland itself. With the war’s end the demand for high numbers of Hawker’s new fighter no longer remained and aircraft contracts were reduced significantly. Whilst ‘Tiger Force’ – the planned force for the Far East – had been cancelled
column28: the RAF still opted to deploy 180 Tempest IIs to the Far East between 1946 and 1947. Four squadrons were stood up in India and used in policing actions in the local area before the aircraft were handed over to the Royal Indian Air Force. The Tempest II was also used as part of the British Forces of Occupation in Germany until July 1949. Only 552 Tempest IIs were built
column29: serving with the RAF
column30: India and Pakistan.";"霍克“暴風”Mk II是一種單座戰鬥機，配備一臺布裡斯托“半人馬座""星型氣冷發動機。

column1: 由於霍克“颱風”的實戰表現不足以勝任截擊機的設計定位，霍克公司不得不繼續研發替代型號。霍克
“旋風”是當初取消的另一種設計，原計劃用一種機體相容兩種發動機。而霍克公司在設計新機型時則
秉承了這一思想，並冠之以“颱風”II的名號。不過，該機後來修改了許多主要設計，且“颱風”這個
字眼已敗了名聲，故乾脆取了個新名字——“暴風”。
計畫中的原型機有兩架：使用“軍刀”IV發動機的“暴風”Mk I，和使用“軍刀”II的“暴風”Mk V。
不久之後，又增添了兩架“暴風”Mk II，配備布裡斯托“半人馬座”18缸星型氣冷發動機，標稱功率
2520馬力。然而到1942年10月簽發500架“暴風”Mk II的訂單時，原型機甚至都還沒上過天。1943年6月
，“暴風”Mk II終於完成首飛，布裡斯托的工廠也在隨後開始了量產工作。1944年10月，第一架量產型
樣機下線。該機和先前的兩架原型機一起繼續接受測試。
“暴風”Mk II原本打算用於遠東戰場的對日作戰，但由於計畫推遲，直至二戰終了都未能投入實戰。
最早使用“暴風”Mk II的兩個中隊是1945年秋開始裝備的第54和247中隊，至於英國本土則只部署了
兩個“暴風”Mk II中隊。戰爭結束後，鑒於對新機型的需求不再迫切，“暴風”Mk II的訂單驟減。
當然，儘管取消了擬派往遠東作戰的“虎軍”，皇家空軍仍舊於1946至1947年間在遠東部署了180架
“暴風”Mk II。印度則成立了四個“暴風”Mk II中隊執行本地警戒任務，隨後全員編入了印度皇家
空軍。1949年7月之前，駐西德的英佔領軍也裝配了“暴風”Mk II。
“暴風”II的總產量僅為552架，分別服役於英國皇家空軍、印度空軍和巴基斯坦空軍。";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column2: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War. In 1941 the Spitfire Mk.IV was the first Spitfire to be trialed with the new Rolls Royce Griffon engine. By the time the Griffon Spitfire entered service with the RAF in February 1943

column4: the Mk.XII’s performance was actually inferior to the Merlin engine Mk.IX at medium and high altitudes. Thus
column5: the Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service as an interim fix. Fitted with a Rolls Royce Griffon 65 with two-stage supercharger producing 2050 hp
column6: the Mk.XIV immediately corrected many of the performance shortcomings suffered by the Mk.XII. The fuselage was strengthened to harness the powerful engine and a five bladed Rotol propeller replaced the earlier four bladed examples. Early models were fitted with the Type C wing although later Mk.XIVs were equipped with the Type E wing housing two 20mm Hispano cannons and two .50 caliber Browning machine guns or four 20mm cannons
column7: as well as a high visibility teardrop canopy. A common modification to the Mk.XIV was the clipped wing
column8: which increased roll rate and gave a marginal increase to speed

column5: Belgium and Thailand.";"Description à venir.";"Il Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XIV era un caccia monoposto e monomotore che servì nella Royal Air Force durante la Seconda Guerra Mondiale. column1: Griffon motoru ile donatılmış ilk Spitfire oldu.Şubat 1943 yılında RAF(Kraliyet Hava Kuvvetleri) tarafından kullanılmaya başlandı.Daha sonraki değişiklikler ile birlikte
Spitfire Mk.XII ortaya çıktı.Mk.XII'ın düşük yüksekliklerde daha başarılı olsada yüksek ve orta yükseklikteki performansı Merlin motorlu Mk.IX'a göre kötüydü.Bu sebepten ötürü
Mk.XIV geçici bir süre için servise girdi.Bu uçak 2050 beygir gücünde iki aşamalı süperkompresörlü Rolls Royce Griffon 65 motoruna sahipti.Mk.XIV kısa sürede Mk.XII'nin performans
eksikliklerini karşıladı.Uçak gövdesi güçlü motor için güçlendirilmişti.Bunun yanında dörtlü pervane yerini beşli Rotol pervanelerine bırakmıştı.İlk modelleri C tipi kanatlara sahip
olsada Mk.XIV'ler E tipi kanatlar ile donatılmıştı.Bu kanatlar 20mm Hispano toplarına ve iki adet .50 kalibre Browning makineli tüfeklerine yada 20mm toplara ev sahipliği yapıyordu.
Ayrıca pilotun gözlerini korumak için yüksek görüş sağlayan gölgeliklerede sahipti.Km.XIV uçaklarına yaygın olarak yapılan bir modifikasyon ise kırpılmış kanatlardı.Bu kanatlar hızını
kendi etrafında dönme hızını(yuvarlanma) ve özellikle tırmanma hızını arttırmıştı.Spitfire Mk.XIV Nos 91'de 322 ve 610 filoda servise girdi.Özellikle İngiltere'nin güneydoğusunda
V-1 Uçan Bombaları'na karşı göze çarpan bir başarı gösterdi.Mk.XIV yanı sıra 2'inci Taktiksel Hava Kuvvetleri tarafından Avrupa operasyonları sırasında sıkça kullanıldı.Spitfire
Mk.XIV kendisin kullanan pilotlar tarafından karışık bir oy aldı.Yinede yeni modelin getirdiği büyük performans farkı süphesizdi.Uyumsuz ve dengesiz olan Merlin motorlu Spitfire
uçaklarını uçurmak rahatsız ediciydi.1000'in biraz altında sayıda Spitfire Mk.XIV üretildi.Bunlara Hindistan
column2: Tayland ve Belçika Hava Kuvvetleri için yapılan ihracatlarda dahildi.";"超\t级\t马\t林\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t它\t在\t二\t战\t期\t间\t服\t役\t于\t英\t国\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t1941 \t年\t，\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk IV \t是\t第\t一\t种\t试\t验\t性\t采\t用\t罗\t-\t罗\t“\t兀\t鹫\t”\t发\t动\t机\t的\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t。\t1943 \t年\t 2 \t月\t“\t兀\t鹫\t”\t型\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t首\t次\t正\t式\t服\t役\t，\t型\t号\t为\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XII\t。\t虽\t然\t在\t低\t空\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XII \t是\t非\t常\t优\t秀\t的\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t但\t在\t中\t高\t空\t表\t现\t并\t不\t如\t“\t灰\t背\t隼\t”\t型\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t。\t于\t是\t，\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t就\t出\t现\t了\t，\t它\t是\t一\t种\t临\t时\t的\t改\t良\t方\t案\t。\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t安\t装\t了\t配\t有\t二\t级\t增\t压\t的\t罗\t-\t罗\t“\t兀\t鹫\t”\t65 \t发\t动\t机\t，\t能\t够\t产\t生\t 2

column1: \t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t所\t在\t的\t第\t 91/322 \t和\t 610 \t中\t队\t驻\t扎\t在\t英\t格\t兰\t南\t部\t，\t在\t那\t里\t，\t这\t些\t新\t式\t战\t机\t在\t拦\t截\t V-1 \t飞\t弹\t上\t取\t得\t了\t相\t当\t的\t成\t功\t，\t另\t外\t它\t们\t也\t作\t为\t第\t二\t战\t术\t空\t军\t的\t一\t员\t活\t跃\t在\t德\t占\t欧\t洲\t的\t天\t空\t。\t它\t们\t还\t计\t划\t在\t远\t东\t战\t场\t上\t使\t用\t，\t而\t且\t有\t相\t当\t数\t量\t的\t飞\t机\t已\t经\t运\t送\t到\t了\t缅\t甸\t，\t然\t而\t在\t战\t争\t结\t束\t前\t，\t没\t有\t任\t何\t一\t架\t投\t入\t服\t役\t。\t根\t据\t飞\t行\t员\t的\t反\t馈\t，\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t毫\t无\t疑\t问\t是\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t家\t族\t的\t一\t大\t性\t能\t升\t级\t型\t号\t，\t然\t而\t它\t也\t如\t同\t一\t匹\t烈\t马\t一\t般\t难\t以\t驯\t服\t，\t其\t平\t衡\t感\t和\t操\t作\t的\t柔\t和\t感\t也\t不\t及\t早\t期\t的\t“\t灰\t背\t隼\t”\t型\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t。\t共\t计\t不\t到\t 1

column1: 胴体は\t高出力の\tエンジンに\t耐えられるよう\t改良され、\tまた\t５枚羽根の\tプロペラはそれまでのそれまでの\t試作型\t４枚羽根の\tプロペラに\t取って\t代わりました。\t前期\tモデルは\tC\t型の\t主翼を\t装備していましたが、\tMk.XIV（後期\tモデル）には\tE\t型の\t主翼が\t装備されています。\tE\t型の\t主翼には\t20mm\tヒスパノ\t機関砲\t2門および\t50口径の\tブローニング\t機銃、\tまたは\t20mm\t機関砲\t4門を\t搭載でき、\t涙滴型の\tキャノピーにより\t良好な\t視界が\t確保されました。\tMk.XIV\t型に\t共通する\t改良点は\tロールレート\t改善し\t速度若干上げ、\t上昇率も\t上げるのために\t切り\t込まれた\t主翼でした。";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XIV was a single engine
column2: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War. In 1941 the Spitfire Mk.IV was the first Spitfire to be trialed with the new Rolls Royce Griffon engine. By the time the Griffon Spitfire entered service with the RAF in February 1943
column3: subsequent modifications had redesignated the aircraft as the Spitfire Mk.XII. As successful as this new Spitfire was at low altitudes
column4: the Mk.XII’s performance was actually inferior to the Merlin engine Mk.IX at medium and high altitudes. Thus

column8: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War. In 1941 the Spitfire Mk.IV was the first Spitfire to be trialed with the new Rolls Royce Griffon engine. By the time the Griffon Spitfire entered service with the RAF in February 1943
column9: subsequent modifications had redesignated the aircraft as the Spitfire Mk.XII. As successful as this new Spitfire was at low altitudes
column10: the Mk.XII’s performance was actually inferior to the Merlin engine Mk.IX at medium and high altitudes. Thus
column11: the Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service as an interim fix. Fitted with a Rolls Royce Griffon 65 with two-stage supercharger producing 2050 hp
column12: the Mk.XIV immediately corrected many of the performance shortcomings suffered by the Mk.XII. The fuselage was strengthened to harness the powerful engine and a five bladed Rotol propeller replaced the earlier four bladed examples. Early models were fitted with the Type C wing although later Mk.XIVs were equipped with the Type E wing housing two 20mm Hispano cannons and two .50 caliber Browning machine guns or four 20mm cannons
column13: as well as a high visibility teardrop canopy. A common modification to the Mk.XIV was the clipped wing
column14: which increased roll rate and gave a marginal increase to speed
column15: but at the most of rate of climb.

Spitfire Mk.XIVs were also planned for use in the Far East but whilst a number of airframes were shipped to Burma

column2: 000 \t架\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t下\t线\t，\t其\t中\t部\t分\t出\t口\t到\t了\t印\t度\t、\t比\t利\t时\t和\t泰\t国\t，\t成\t为\t当\t地\t空\t军\t的\t骨\t干\t。";"スーパーマリン スピットファイア Mk.XIV は\t第二次世界大戦中に\t活躍した\tイギリス\t空軍の\t単座単発戦闘機です。\t1941年に\t新たに\tロールスロイス\t製\tグリフォンエンジンを\t搭載した\t最初の\tスピットファイア Mk.IVが\t試験飛行します。\tその\t後\t1943年までの\t間に\tイギリス\t空軍において\tグリフォンスピットファイアは Mk.XII まで\t改良が\t続けられます。\tこの\t新しい\tスピットファイアは\t低空時の\t戦闘能力に\t長けていましたが、\t中高高度では\tスーパーマリンスピットファイア\tMk.IXに\t及ばなかったのが\t実情です。\tそのため、\tスピットファイア Mk.XIVでは\t暫定的な\t修正が\t行われ、\t2
column3: 050馬力を\t発揮する\tロールスロイス\t製の\t二段階\tスーパーチャージャーによって\t数々の\t欠点は\t直ちに\t修正されました。\t

column1: 胴体は\t高出力の\tエンジンに\t耐えられるよう\t改良され、\tまた\t５枚羽根の\tプロペラはそれまでのそれまでの\t試作型\t４枚羽根の\tプロペラに\t取って\t代わりました。\t前期\tモデルは\tC\t型の\t主翼を\t装備していましたが、\tMk.XIV（後期\tモデル）には\tE\t型の\t主翼が\t装備されています。\tE\t型の\t主翼には\t20mm\tヒスパノ\t機関砲\t2門および\t50口径の\tブローニング\t機銃、\tまたは\t20mm\t機関砲\t4門を\t搭載でき、\t涙滴型の\tキャノピーにより\t良好な\t視界が\t確保されました。\tMk.XIV\t型に\t共通する\t改良点は\tロールレート\t改善し\t速度若干上げ、\t上昇率も\t上げるのために\t切り\t込まれた\t主翼でした。";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XIV was a single engine
column2: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War. In 1941 the Spitfire Mk.IV was the first Spitfire to be trialed with the new Rolls Royce Griffon engine. By the time the Griffon Spitfire entered service with the RAF in February 1943
column3: subsequent modifications had redesignated the aircraft as the Spitfire Mk.XII. As successful as this new Spitfire was at low altitudes
column4: the Mk.XII’s performance was actually inferior to the Merlin engine Mk.IX at medium and high altitudes. Thus
column5: the Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service as an interim fix. Fitted with a Rolls Royce Griffon 65 with two-stage supercharger producing 2050 hp
column6: the Mk.XIV immediately corrected many of the performance shortcomings suffered by the Mk.XII. The fuselage was strengthened to harness the powerful engine and a five bladed Rotol propeller replaced the earlier four bladed examples. Early models were fitted with the Type C wing although later Mk.XIVs were equipped with the Type E wing housing two 20mm Hispano cannons and two .50 caliber Browning machine guns or four 20mm cannons
column7: as well as a high visibility teardrop canopy. A common modification to the Mk.XIV was the clipped wing
column8: which increased roll rate and gave a marginal increase to speed
column9: but at the most of rate of climb.

column1: The Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service with Nos. 91
column2: 322 and 610 Squadrons in southeast England where it saw notable success as an interceptor against V-1 Flying Bombs but also as part of the 2nd Tactical Air Force in operations over occupied Europe. Spitfire Mk.XIVs were also planned for use in the Far East but whilst a number of airframes were shipped to Burma
column3: none were operational before the end of the war. The Spitfire Mk.XIV met mixed reviews from its pilots; whilst there was no doubt of the huge performance increase the new variant offered
column4: it was uncomfortable to fly and lacked the balance and control harmonization of earlier Merlin engine Spitfires. Just under 1000 Spitfire Mk.XIVs were produced with exports being employed by the Air Forces of India

column7: оснащеною новим двигуном Роллс-Ройс «Грифон». На час постановки машини з новим двигуном на озброєння ВПС

column9: додаткові модифікації привели до зміни його кодового позначення на «Спітфайр» Mk.XII. На малих висотах Mk.XII демонстрував відмінні характеристики
column10: однак на середніх і великих висотах він фактично програвав Mk.IX з двигуном «Мерлін». Таким чином

column12: потужністю в 2050 л. с.

column17: несучі дві 20-мм гармати «Іспано» і два кулемети Браунінга калібру .50

column6: якую аснасцілі новым рухавіком Rolls Royce Griffon. Да моманту ўзяцця машыны з новым рухавіком на ўзбраенне ВПС у лютым 1943 г. дадатковыя мадыфікацыі прывялі да змены яго кодавага абазначэння на Spitfire Mk.XII. На малой вышыні Mk.XII дэманстраваў выдатныя характарыстыкі

column6: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the Second World War. In 1941 the Spitfire Mk.IV was the first Spitfire to be trialed with the new Rolls Royce Griffon engine. By the time the Griffon Spitfire entered service with the RAF in February 1943
column7: subsequent modifications had redesignated the aircraft as the Spitfire Mk.XII. As successful as this new Spitfire was at low altitudes
column8: the Mk.XII’s performance was actually inferior to the Merlin engine Mk.IX at medium and high altitudes. Thus
column9: the Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service as an interim fix. Fitted with a Rolls Royce Griffon 65 with two-stage supercharger producing 2050 hp
column10: the Mk.XIV immediately corrected many of the performance shortcomings suffered by the Mk.XII. The fuselage was strengthened to harness the powerful engine and a five bladed Rotol propeller replaced the earlier four bladed examples. Early models were fitted with the Type C wing although later Mk.XIVs were equipped with the Type E wing housing two 20mm Hispano cannons and two .50 caliber Browning machine guns or four 20mm cannons
column11: as well as a high visibility teardrop canopy. A common modification to the Mk.XIV was the clipped wing
column12: which increased roll rate and gave a marginal increase to speed
column13: but at the most of rate of climb.

column1: The Spitfire Mk.XIV entered service with Nos. 91
column2: 322 and 610 Squadrons in southeast England where it saw notable success as an interceptor against V-1 Flying Bombs but also as part of the 2nd Tactical Air Force in operations over occupied Europe. Spitfire Mk.XIVs were also planned for use in the Far East but whilst a number of airframes were shipped to Burma
column3: none were operational before the end of the war. The Spitfire Mk.XIV met mixed reviews from its pilots; whilst there was no doubt of the huge performance increase the new variant offered
column4: it was uncomfortable to fly and lacked the balance and control harmonization of earlier Merlin engine Spitfires. Just under 1000 Spitfire Mk.XIVs were produced with exports being employed by the Air Forces of India
column5: Belgium and Thailand.";"简\t介\t尚\t未\t准\t备\t好\t。";;

column1: encyclopedia/spitfire_mk18e;"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk XVIIIe";"Supermarine Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIE";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"“\t喷\t火\t”\t F Mk 18E";"スピットファイア F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"슈퍼마린 스핏파이어 F Mk.XVIIIe (Supermarine Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe)";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"Spitfire F Mk.XVIIIe";"“\t喷\t火\t”\t F Mk 18E";;
encyclopedia/spitfire_mk18e/desc;"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XVIII was a single engine single
column2: seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. After the initial teething problems encountered with the introduction of the Rolls Royce Griffon engine to the Spitfire line
column3: the Spitfire Mk.XIV had been used successfully in large numbers in the European Theatre of Operations. The Mk.XIV had seen notable modifications and transitions throughout its wartime service; the Spitfire Mk.XVIII built on this experience. The Spitfire Mk.XVIII was also equipped with a Rolls Royce Griffon 65 engine with two stage supercharger rated at 2050 hp
column4: high visibility teardrop canopy and a Type E Wing with two Hispano 20mm cannon and two .50 caliber Browning machine guns or four 20mm cannons and externally was very similar to the later production Mk.XIV Spitfires. However
column5: the Spitfire Mk.XVIII also featured a strengthened fuselage and an additional 31-gallon fuel tank in the rear fuselage.

column1: The Spitfire Mk.XVIII entered service with No.60 Squadron at Singapore in January 1947. The Mk.XVIII was used offensively against insurgents during the Malayan uprising. The Mk.XVIII was also involved in air-to-air combat during the 1948 Arab-Israeli War where in one famous incident
column2: two Israeli Spitfire Mk.IXs flown by a Canadian and an American pilot shot down four RAF Spitfire Mk.XVIIIs of No.208 Squadron.

column1: Some 300 Spitfire Mk.XVIIIs were built with only the Royal Indian Air Force purchasing 20 as an export customer. ";"Description à venir. ";"Il Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XVIII era un caccia monomotore e monoposto che entrò in servizio nella Royal Air Force durante il primo periodo del dopoguerra. Al seguito di vari problemi incontrati subito dopo l'introduzione dei motori Rolls-Royce Griffon nella linea degli Spitfire
column2: un gran numero della variante Mk.XIV fu impiegato con successo nel teatro di operazioni Europeo. L'Mk.XIV fu sottoposto a notevoli modifiche e transizioni durante il servizio in tempo di guerra; lo Spitfire Mk.XVIII fu quindi costruito basato su esperienze in volo. Lo Spitfire Mk.XVIII fu inoltre equipaggiato con un motore Rolls Royce Griffon 65 dotato di un compressore a due stati capace di 2050 hp
column3: un tettuccio a goccia ad alta visibilità e delle ali di tipo E con due cannoni Hispano da 20mm e due mitragliatrici Browning di calibro .50 o quattro cannoni da 20mm. Esternamente
column4: benché molto simile agli ultimi Spitfire Mk.XIV di produzione
column5: lo Spitfire Mk.XVIII era però caratterizzato da una fusoliera rinforzata e da un serbatoio di carburante addizionale da 31 galloni sito nella fusoliera posteriore.

column1: Lo Spitfire Mk.XVIII entrò in servizio con lo Squadrone 60 a Singapore nel Gennaio del 1947. Venne quindi usato nell'offensiva contro insorti durante le rivolte in Malaya. Venne anche coinvolto in combattimento aereo durante la guerra arabo-israeliana del 1948 dove
column2: in un famoso episodio
column3: due Spitfire Mk.IX israeliani pilotati da un pilota Canadese e uno Americano abbatterono quattro Spitfire Mk.XVIII RAF dello Squadrone 208.

column1: Some 300 Spitfire Mk.XVIIIs were built with only the Royal Indian Air Force purchasing 20 as an export customer. ";"Супермарин ""Спитфайр"" Mk.XVIII был одномоторным одноместным истребителем
column2: который стоял на вооружении Королевских ВВС Великобритании в начале послевоенного периода. После преодоления некоторых проблем
column3: возникших в результате внедрения в линейку ""Спитфайров"" двигателя Роллс-Ройс ""Гриффон""
column4: ""Спитфайр"" Mk.XIV успешно применялся во множестве операций на Европейском театре военных действий. ""Спитфайр"" Mk.XIV за время своей военной службы подвергался существенным модификациям и изменениям
column5: и на основе накопленного опыта был создан ""Спитфайр"" Mk. XVIII. ""Спитфайр"" Mk.XVIII также был оснащен двигателем Роллс-Ройс ""Гриффон"" 65
column6: с двухступенчатой турбиной и мощностью 2050 л. с.
column7: каплевидным фонарем с улучшенным обзором
column8: крылом типа Е с двумя 20-мм пушками ""Испано"" и двумя пулемётами Браунинга калибра .50 или четырьмя 20-мм пушками
column9: и внешне был очень схожим с поздними моделями ""Спитфайров"" Mk.XIV. Однако ""Спитфайр"" Mk.XVIII имел усиленный фюзеляж и дополнительный топливный бак объемом 117
column10: 3 л в задней части фюзеляжа.

column1: Спитфайр"" Mk.XVIII был принят на вооружение в январе 1947 года и поступил в эскадрилью №60
column2: базировавшуюся в Сингапуре. Во время Малайского восстания Mk. XVIII применялся против повстанцев. Mk.XVIII участвовал также в воздушных боях во время арабо-израильского конфликта в 1948 году. Знаменитым стал инцидент
column3: в котором два израильских ""Спитфайра"" Mk.IX под управлением канадского и американского пилотов сбили четыре ""Спитфайра"" Mk.XVIII эскадрильи №208 Королевских ВВС Великобритании.

column1: Spitfire Mk XVIII znalazł się w styczniu 1947 roku na wyposażeniu 60 Eskadry służącej w Singapurze. Wykorzystywano go przeciw powstańcom na Malajach oraz w walkach powietrznych podczas I wojny izraelsko-arabskiej

";"Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XVIII byl jednomotorový jednomístný stíhací letoun sloužící u Royal Air Force v raném poválečném období. Po počátečních problémech se zavedením motoru Rolls Royce Griffon v sérii Spitfire bylo velké množství Spitfirů Mk.XIV úspěšně použito na evropském bojišti. U Mk.XIV byla během jeho válečné služby provedena řada pozoruhodných modifikací a změn
column2: a Spitfire Mk.XVIII na těchto zkušenostech stavěl.

column1: Spitfire Mk.XVIII byl vybaven motorem Rolls Royce Griffon 65 s dvoustupňovým kompresorem s výkonem 2050 koní

column4: nicméně Spitfire Mk.XVIII měl zesílený trup a další 31galonovou palivovou nádrž v zadní části trupu.

column1: Spitfire Mk.XVIII byl zaveden do služby v lednu 1947 u 60. perutě v Singapuru. Tyto letouny byly použity při útocích proti povstalcům během Malajského povstání. Mk.XVIII se také zapojily do leteckých soubojů během Arabsko-izraelské války v roce 1948
column2: kde se v jednom slavném incidentu dva izraelské Spitfiry Mk.IX pilotované kanadským a americkým pilotem sestřelily čtyři Spitfiry Mk.XVIII z 208. perutě RAF. Bylo vyrobeno okolo 300 letounů Spitfire Mk.XVIII
column3: přičemž dvacet bylo dodáno Indickému královskému vojenskému letectvu.";"Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XVIII

";"超\t级\t马\t林\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18 \t是\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t，\t该\t机\t型\t在\t战\t后\t初\t期\t服\t役\t于\t英\t国\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t。\t在\t解\t决\t了\t“\t兀\t鹫\t”\t型\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t早\t期\t型\t号\t上\t遇\t到\t的\t初\t期\t问\t题\t后\t，\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk XIV \t在\t欧\t洲\t战\t场\t的\t行\t动\t中\t相\t当\t成\t功\t。\tMk XIV \t被\t人\t们\t看\t成\t是\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t战\t时\t服\t役\t史\t上\t最\t重\t要\t的\t改\t进\t和\t过\t渡\t。\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18 \t就\t是\t以\t此\t为\t基\t础\t进\t行\t设\t计\t制\t造\t的\t，\t依\t旧\t采\t用\t高\t能\t见\t度\t的\t气\t泡\t座\t舱\t和\t可\t以\t安\t装\t双\t炮\t双\t枪\t或\t者\t四\t炮\t的\t E \t型\t机\t翼\t，\t从\t外\t观\t上\t看\t其\t与\t Mk XIV \t的\t后\t期\t型\t号\t很\t相\t似\t。\t不\t过\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18 \t还\t配\t备\t了\t强\t化\t机\t身\t和\t增\t大\t的\t后\t机\t身\t油\t箱\t，\t该\t油\t箱\t可\t多\t容\t纳\t 31 \t英\t制\t加\t仑\t的\t燃\t料\t。\t

column1: \t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18 \t于\t 1947 \t年\t 1 \t月\t服\t役\t，\t装\t备\t在\t新\t加\t坡\t基\t地\t的\t第\t 60 \t中\t队\t。\tMk 18 \t在\t马\t来\t危\t机\t时\t被\t用\t来\t镇\t压\t起\t义\t者\t。\t它\t还\t在\t 1948 \t年\t参\t加\t了\t第\t一\t次\t中\t东\t战\t争\t并\t创\t造\t了\t著\t名\t的\t战\t例\t：\t两\t架\t由\t加\t拿\t大\t和\t美\t国\t飞\t行\t员\t驾\t驶\t的\t以\t色\t列\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk IX \t击\t落\t了\t四\t架\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t第\t 208 \t中\t队\t的\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18\t。\t

\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 18 \t共\t制\t造\t了\t约\t 300 \t架\t，\t其\t中\t印\t度\t空\t军\t订\t购\t了\t 20 \t架\t，\t这\t也\t是\t该\t型\t号\t唯\t一\t的\t海\t外\t订\t单\t。";"スーパーマリン スピットファイア Mk.XVIII は\t戦時下の\t早い\t時期に\t投入された\t単発、\t単座の\tイギリス\t空軍戦闘機です。\t初期の\tスピットファイア\t向け\tロールス・ロイス グリフォンエンジンは\tトラブルを\t抱えていたものの、\tのちに\tスピットファイア Mk.XIVに\t搭載され\t数多くの\tヨーロッパ\t戦線に\t投入され\t成功を\t収めます。\tMK.XIVには\t注目すべき\t改良が\t加えられ、\tまた\t戦時中を\t通して\t改良され\t続けます。\tそして\tスピットファイア Mk.XVIIIはこの\t機体を\t元に\t開発されました。\tさらに、\tスピットファイア Mk.XVIIIはまた\t二段階式\tスーパーチャージャーを\t装備した\t2
column2: 050馬力の\tロールス・ロイス グリフォン\t65型\tエンジンを\t搭載し、\t視界の\t良い\t涙滴型の\tキャノピーや\t20mm\tイスパノ\t機関砲と\t50口径\tブローニング\t機銃を\t２門ずつ、\tまたは\t20mm\t機関砲\t４門を\t翼内に\t配置し\t外観はのちに\t投入された\tスピットファイア Mk.XIV と\t大変よく\t似ていました。\t一方で\tスピットファイア Mk.XVIII は\t胴体部を\t強化し\t31\tガロンの\t燃料\tタンクを\t機体後部に\t装備していました。\t

column1: スピットファイア Mk.XVIII は\t1947年\t1月に\tシンガポールの\t第\t60飛行体に\t配属されました。\tMk.XVIIIは\t蜂起した\tマレー\t人部隊への\t攻撃に\t使用されました。\tまた\tMk.XVIIIは\t1948年の\tアラブ・イスラエル\t紛争のさなか、\tカナダ\t人と\tアメリカ\t人\tパイロットが\t操縦する\t２機の\tイスラエル\t軍\tスピットファイア Mk.IXが\t４機の\tイギリス\t空軍第\t208航空隊の\tMk.XVIIIを\t撃ち\t落とすという\t事件にも\t関わっています。\t
300機近い\tインド\t空軍用\tスピットファイア Mk.XVIIIが\t製造されましたが\t実際に\t輸出されたのは\t20機にとどまりました。";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.XVIII was a single engine single

encyclopedia/spitfire_f22/desc;"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.22 was a single engine
column2: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. When the first Rolls Royce Griffon equipped Spitfires were tested it was obvious that a stronger airframe would be needed to harness the full power of the new engine. Added to this was the requirement for a much stiffer wing; the result of these findings was the Spitfire Mk.21. The Mk.21 was also fitted with larger ailerons and the same 2050 hp Griffon 65 engine which was fitted to the Mk.XIV and Mk.XVIII. By this point in the aircraft’s life
column3: the Spitfire was so different from RJ Mitchell’s original concept that the notion of renaming the new aircraft the ‘Victor’ was considered. The Air Fighting Development Unit at RAF Boscombe Down began to test the Mk.21 in late 1944
column4: but were deeply unhappy with the new Spitfire and recommended that no further attempts were made to progress the basic Spitfire design. Chief amongst the AFDU’s complaints was directional instability: Supermarine attempted to solve this problem by modifying the control surfaces. It was only with the introduction of a new
column5: enlarged tailfin and tail plane which finally solved the instability problems. The Mk.22 differed from the Mk.21 only in having a teardrop bubble canopy – a change which had not required a new mark number in previous Spitfires – and a different electrical system. The Mk.22
column6: as with the Mk.21
column7: was armed with four 20mm Hispano cannons. The Mk.22 was more prolific and more successful than the Mk.21
column8: with some 280 aircraft being manufactured. It was used to equip No.73 Squadron and twelve squadrons of the Royal Auxiliary Air Force. In 1955 the Spitfire Mk.22 was declared obsolete by the RAF and many were exported to South Rhodesia
column9: Syria and Egypt. ";"Description à venir. ";"Il Supermarine Spitfire Mk.22 era un caccia monomotore e monoposto che prestò servizio nella Royal Air Force nel periodo dell'immediato dopoguerra. Quando i primi Spitfire equipaggiati con motori Rolls Royce Griffon furono testati divenne subito ovvio che una fusoliera più resistente era necessaria per imbrigliare la piena potenza del nuovo motore; Il risultato di questa ricerca fu lo spitfire Mk.21. L'Mk.21 era inoltre dotato di alettoni più grandi e lo stesso motore Griffon 65 da 2050 cavalli montato sui modelli Mk.XIV e Mk.XVIII. Da questo momento nella vita del velivolo
column10: lo Spitfire era così diverso dal progetto originale di RJ Mitchell che fu presa in considerazione l'idea di rinominarlo ""Victor"". La Air Fighting Development Unit al RAF Boscombe Down cominciò a testare l'Mk.21 verso la fine del 1944
column11: ma rimasero negativamente colpiti e raccomandarono di non proseguire oltre nel tentativo di migliorare il design di base dello Spitfire. Il principale motivo di questa decisione da parte dell'AFDU era l'instabilità direzionale del velivolo: Supermarine provò a risolvere il problema modificando le superfici di controllo. Solo con l'introduzione di un nuovo ed allargato timone e piano di coda si risolvero i problemi di instabilità. L'Mk.22 differiva dall'Mk.21 solo per la nuova calotta a goccia - un cambiamento che non richiedette un nuovo numero di contrassengo nelle versioni di Spitifire precendenti - e un sistema elettrico differente. L'Mk.22
column12: così come l'Mk.21
column13: era armato con quattro cannoni Hispano da 20mm. L'Mk.22 fu pià numeroso dell'Mk.21 ed ebbe un maggiore suvvesso. Fu utilizzato per equipaggiare il No.73 Squadron e dodici squadroni della Royal Auxiliary Air Force. Nel 1955 lo Spitfire Mk.22 fu dichiarato obsoleto dalla RAF e molti furono esportati nella Rhodesia del Sud

column32: что для такого мощного двигателя необходим более прочный фюзеляж. Также более жесткими должны были стать крылья. Результатом этих находок стал ""Спитфайр"" Mk.21. Mk.21 получил удлиненные элероны и был оснащен тем же 2050-сильным двигателем ""Гриффон"" 65
column33: что и Mk.XIV и Mk.XVIII. К тому моменту ""Спитфайр"" уже настолько отличался от исходного замысла Р. Дж. Митчелла
column34: что рассматривалась возможность присвоения самолёту нового имени ""Виктор"". Испытания Mk.21 начались в конце 1944 года в летно-испытательном центре на аэродроме Боскомб Даун. Однако впечатления от нового ""Спитфайра"" были крайне негативные
column35: поэтому было рекомендовано прекратить работы по усовершенствованию базовой модели. Основным недостатком

column38: изменив управляющие поверхности самолёта. Лишь новый

column40: которое не приводило к смене кодового наименования в предыдущих моделях ""Спитфайров"" — и новой системы электроснабжения. Mk.22
column42: был вооружен четырьмя 20-мм пушками ""Испано"". Mk.22 был более массовым и успешным

column2: 050馬力の\tグリフォン\t65\tエンジンを\t搭載するのに\t適していました。\tこの\t時点での\t航空機史において\tスピットファイアは\tR.J.ミッチェルの\t新しい\t機体に「ビクター(勝者)」\tと\t名付けるとする\t概念とは\t大きく\t違っていました。\t1944年の\t後半に\tイギリス\t空軍の\t航空機開発部門である\tボスコムダウンで\tMk.21\tの\t試験が\t開始されましたが、\t彼らはこの\t新しい\tスピットファイアに\t大いに\t失望しました。\tそして\t元々の\tスピットファイアの\t設計を\t流用しないことを\t進言します。";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.22 was a single engine
column3: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. When the first Rolls Royce Griffon equipped Spitfires were tested it was obvious that a stronger airframe would be needed to harness the full power of the new engine. Added to this was the requirement for a much stiffer wing; the result of these findings was the Spitfire Mk.21. The Mk.21 was also fitted with larger ailerons and the same 2050 hp Griffon 65 engine which was fitted to the Mk.XIV and Mk.XVIII. By this point in the aircraft’s life
column4: the Spitfire was so different from RJ Mitchell’s original concept that the notion of renaming the new aircraft the ‘Victor’ was considered. The Air Fighting Development Unit at RAF Boscombe Down began to test the Mk.21 in late 1944
column5: but were deeply unhappy with the new Spitfire and recommended that no further attempts were made to progress the basic Spitfire design. Chief amongst the AFDU’s complaints was directional instability: Supermarine attempted to solve this problem by modifying the control surfaces. It was only with the introduction of a new
column6: enlarged tailfin and tail plane which finally solved the instability problems. The Mk.22 differed from the Mk.21 only in having a teardrop bubble canopy – a change which had not required a new mark number in previous Spitfires – and a different electrical system. The Mk.22
column7: as with the Mk.21
column8: was armed with four 20mm Hispano cannons. The Mk.22 was more prolific and more successful than the Mk.21
column9: with some 280 aircraft being manufactured. It was used to equip No.73 Squadron and twelve squadrons of the Royal Auxiliary Air Force. In 1955 the Spitfire Mk.22 was declared obsolete by the RAF and many were exported to South Rhodesia

column18: Сірыю і Егіпет.";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.22 was a single engine
column19: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. When the first Rolls Royce Griffon equipped Spitfires were tested it was obvious that a stronger airframe would be needed to harness the full power of the new engine. Added to this was the requirement for a much stiffer wing; the result of these findings was the Spitfire Mk.21. The Mk.21 was also fitted with larger ailerons and the same 2050 hp Griffon 65 engine which was fitted to the Mk.XIV and Mk.XVIII. By this point in the aircraft’s life
column20: the Spitfire was so different from RJ Mitchell’s original concept that the notion of renaming the new aircraft the ‘Victor’ was considered. The Air Fighting Development Unit at RAF Boscombe Down began to test the Mk.21 in late 1944
column21: but were deeply unhappy with the new Spitfire and recommended that no further attempts were made to progress the basic Spitfire design. Chief amongst the AFDU’s complaints was directional instability: Supermarine attempted to solve this problem by modifying the control surfaces. It was only with the introduction of a new
column22: enlarged tailfin and tail plane which finally solved the instability problems. The Mk.22 differed from the Mk.21 only in having a teardrop bubble canopy – a change which had not required a new mark number in previous Spitfires – and a different electrical system. The Mk.22
column23: as with the Mk.21
column24: was armed with four 20mm Hispano cannons. The Mk.22 was more prolific and more successful than the Mk.21
column25: with some 280 aircraft being manufactured. It was used to equip No.73 Squadron and twelve squadrons of the Royal Auxiliary Air Force. In 1955 the Spitfire Mk.22 was declared obsolete by the RAF and many were exported to South Rhodesia

encyclopedia/spitfire_f24/desc;"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.24 was a single engine
column2: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. The Mk.24 was the very last land based Spitfire of the long and illustrious line of fighters. It differed only from late production Spitfire Mk.22s in having two extra fuel tanks fitted in the rear fuselage and provisions for under wing rockets. Late versions of the Spitfire Mk.24 were also fitted with the short barrel Hispano Mk.V 20mm cannon. Only 54 Spitfire Mk.24s were built with a further 27 being converted from Mk.22 airframes. Contra-rotating propellers were tested on the Mk.21
column3: 22 and 24 Spitfires but were still not perfected in time to see service on this last Spitfire variant. The contra-rotating propeller would
column4: however see front line service with the Fleet Air Arm’s Seafire Mk.46 and Mk.47. The Spitfire Mk.24 entered service in 1946 with No.80 Squadron in Gutersloh
column5: Germany; the squadron later moved to Hong Kong. In January 1952 the RAF’s last front line Spitfire squadron handed its aircraft over to the Hong Kong Auxiliary Air Force
column6: ending a legacy of over 25 years of perhaps the most famous and iconic fighter aircraft in aviation history. ";"Description à venir. ";"Il Supermarine Spitfire Mk.24 fu un caccia monomotore e monoposto che servì nella Royal Air Force nel primo dopoguerra. L'Mk24 fu l'ultimo Spitifre non navale della lunga ed illustre serie di caccia. Differiva dall'Mk.22 di tarda produzione solo in due serbatoi addizionali nel retro della fusoliera e agganci sotto le ali per i razzi. Le successive versioni dello Spitfire Mk.24 erano anche equipaggiate con cannoni Hispano Mk.V a canna corta. Solo 54 esemplari di questo aereo furono prodotte con 27 esemplari addizionali convertiti da fusoliere di Mk.22. Sui modelli Mk21
column7: 22 e 24 furono testate pale controrotanti
column8: ma non furono perfezionate in tempo per vedere servizio su quest'ultima variante dello Spitfire. Le pale controrotanti vedranno comunque servizio di prima linea montate sui Seafire Mk.46 ed Mk.47 della Fleet Air Arm. Lo spitfire Mk.24 entrò in servizio nel 1946 con l'80esimo Squadrone a Guterslosh
column9: in Germania; lo squadrone si spostò ad Hong Kong successivamente. Nel Gennaio 1952 l'ultimo squadrone di prima linea operante gli Spitfire affidò i propri apparecchi alla Hong Kong Auxiliary Air Force

""Спитфайр"" Mk.24 был принят на вооружение в 1946 году и был поставлен в эскадрилью №80 на аэродроме Гютерсло в Германии. Позднее эскадрилья была переброшена в Гонконг. ";"超\t级\t马\t林\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 24 \t是\t战\t后\t初\t期\t服\t役\t于\t英\t国\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t的\t一\t种\t单\t发\t单\t座\t战\t斗\t机\t。\t在\t漫\t长\t而\t又\t光\t辉\t的\t研\t发\t历\t程\t中\t，\tMk 24 \t是\t最\t后\t一\t种\t陆\t基\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t，\t其\t与\t后\t期\t型\t Mk 22 \t的\t区\t别\t仅\t仅\t在\t于\t后\t机\t身\t追\t加\t了\t两\t个\t油\t箱\t以\t及\t机\t翼\t下\t可\t以\t安\t装\t火\t箭\t弹\t。\t后\t期\t型\t的\t Mk 24 \t还\t安\t装\t了\t短\t身\t管\t的\t 20 \t毫\t米\t西\t斯\t帕\t诺\t Mk V \t机\t炮\t。\tMk 24 \t只\t制\t造\t了\t 54 \t架\t，\t还\t有\t 27 \t架\t由\t Mk 22 \t改\t进\t而\t来\t。\t共\t轴\t反\t桨\t在\t Mk 21\t、\t22 \t和\t 24 \t上\t进\t行\t了\t测\t试\t，\t然\t而\t依\t旧\t没\t达\t到\t列\t装\t的\t要\t求\t。\t不\t过\t这\t种\t螺\t旋\t桨\t将\t会\t在\t未\t来\t安\t装\t在\t舰\t队\t航\t空\t队\t的\t“\t海\t火\t”\tMk 46 \t和\t 47 \t上\t。\t“\t喷\t火\t”\tMk 24 \t于\t 1946 \t年\t服\t役\t，\t装\t备\t于\t德\t国\t居\t特\t斯\t洛\t的\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t第\t 80 \t中\t队\t，\t这\t个\t中\t队\t后\t来\t换\t防\t到\t了\t香\t港\t。\t1952 \t年\t 1 \t月\t，\t皇\t家\t空\t军\t最\t后\t一\t个\t前\t线\t“\t喷\t火\t”\t中\t队\t将\t飞\t机\t移\t交\t给\t了\t香\t港\t辅\t助\t空\t军\t，\t以\t此\t宣\t告\t了\t也\t许\t是\t世\t界\t航\t空\t史\t上\t最\t著\t名\t以\t及\t最\t具\t有\t标\t志\t性\t意\t义\t的\t战\t斗\t机\t在\t 25 \t年\t的\t传\t奇\t服\t役\t生\t涯\t后\t，\t慢\t慢\t退\t出\t历\t史\t舞\t台\t。";"スーパーマリン スピットファイア Mk.24 は、\t戦争初期に\t投入された\tイギリス\t空軍の\t単発、\t単座戦闘機です。\tMk.24 は、\t陸上戦闘機としての\tスピットファイアの\t輝かしい\tラインナップの\t最後を\t飾る\t戦闘機です。\t後期型との\t違いは、\t機体後部と\t両翼の\tロケットの\t下にある\t追加燃料\tタンクで\t見分けることができます。\t後期型の\tMk.24 は\t単砲身の\tイスパノ Mk. V20 型\tキャノン\t砲を\t搭載していました。\tたった\t54機の\tMk.24s 型が 製造され、\tそのうち\t27機は\tMk.22 の\tフレームを\t利用して\t製造されました。\t

column1: 二重反転式の\tプロペラは、\tMk.21 、\tMk.22 そして\tMk.24 で\t試験運用されましたが、\tその\t時点では\tスピットファイアの\t最終形となることは\t決まっていませんでした。\tしかしながら、\t二重反転\tプロペラは、\t前線の\t艦載機 シーファイア Mk.46 および Mk.47 に\t使用されていました。\tスピットファイア Mk.24 は\t1946年、\tドイツの\tギュータースローにある\tアメリカ\t第\t80飛行隊で\t初の\t戦闘を\t行い、\tのちに\t香港に\t移動することになりました。\t1952年の\t1月には、\tイギリス\t空軍最後の\t善戦に\t遭った\tスピットファイア\t分隊は\t香港の\t補助飛行隊に\t引き\t渡され、\tおそらく\t航空史上最も\t有名で\t象徴的な\t歴史を\t刻みました。\t ";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.24 was a single engine

column12: самага легендарнага самалёта-знішчальніка ў гісторыі авіяцыі.";"The Supermarine Spitfire Mk.24 was a single engine
column13: single seat fighter which served with the Royal Air Force during the early post war period. The Mk.24 was the very last land based Spitfire of the long and illustrious line of fighters. It differed only from late production Spitfire Mk.22s in having two extra fuel tanks fitted in the rear fuselage and provisions for under wing rockets. Late versions of the Spitfire Mk.24 were also fitted with the short barrel Hispano Mk.V 20mm cannon. Only 54 Spitfire Mk.24s were built with a further 27 being converted from Mk.22 airframes. Contra-rotating propellers were tested on the Mk.21
column14: 22 and 24 Spitfires but were still not perfected in time to see service on this last Spitfire variant. The contra-rotating propeller would
column15: however see front line service with the Fleet Air Arm’s Seafire Mk.46 and Mk.47. The Spitfire Mk.24 entered service in 1946 with No.80 Squadron in Gutersloh
column16: Germany; the squadron later moved to Hong Kong. In January 1952 the RAF’s last front line Spitfire squadron handed its aircraft over to the Hong Kong Auxiliary Air Force

encyclopedia/lancaster_mk1/desc;"With RAF Bomber Command’s focus being centred on the strategic bombing campaign against German industry
column2: the RAF desperately required a force of heavy bombers to increase the capability provided by their medium bomber fleet. A twin engine Avro Manchester bomber was converted to be powered by four engines and first flown in January 1941. This and subsequent prototypes were deemed to be so successful that the first production variant of the new bomber
column3: now named the Lancaster
column4: was flown in October 1941.

column1: Powered by four Rolls Royce Merlin XX engines rated at 1280 hp
column2: (later upgraded to Merlin 22 or 24s) the Lancaster B.I was capable of reaching speeds of up to 275 mph. With a standard fuel load it could carry 10
column3: 000 lbs of bombs over 1000 miles. The maximum ordinance capacity of the Lancaster was one of the highest of any heavy bomber in World War II: 14
column5: 356 kg). Besides standard bombs

column11: such as the 22
